378a3(ta): gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ snying pa'i lus su grub tshul gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // kun byed kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal
378a4(ta): pa/ nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// sangs rgyas gsung la sems can sgra// snying po sgra yi gdams pa 'di// snying po yin par gzhi ru bca'// gang snang
378a5(ta): ming du btags pa kun// snying po'i chos su bsgrub par bya// chog tu yi ge ming gis btags// pa tags bsgrags gang brjod snying pa'i sgra// gzhi dang bsgrub
378a6(ta): byed gzhan 'a phrang bsnga mas// yi ge'i tshogs sogs grogs su 'gyur// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pha pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/
378a7(ta): sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ oM au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aHAM/ de dag snying po hUM gi grogs// sku gsum khyab byed rgya ma
378b1(ta): chad/ da ni rang byung snying po'i chos// gcod byed cha ldan 'joms par byed// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa nya// gtan 'bebs thig le du sa la ba ba/
378b2(ta): yod med gnyis la 'jug pa na// rig pa gan sa lugs 'khor ba'i rgyu// bskyed par byed pas chos nyid ma// rtsa ba nyam myong 'dzin pa yin// gnas lugs snying
378b3(ta): po wa nas drongs// zha' za byed stong pa'i dbyings// sku gsum mya ngan 'das pa yA// thugs rje gnas lugs shes rab shugs// sa ni 'gyur ba med par brten
378b4(ta): ha ni 'gag med snying po'i dbyings// skye ba med pas snying po A// mgo 'dren 'bod bde skabs su 'byed// 'dzin pa mkhyen byed gcod pa dang // 'brel khyab sdud pa snying
378b5(ta): po'i grogs// snying po min pa gang zhig brjod// yi ge min pa srog snying gang // yi 'bru med par gzugs snang ci// srog dang snying po gdams pa yin// srog ni gzugs
378b6(ta): la snying po ming // gzugs nas gzung nas snying pos bod// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las// gsang ba sgra dang srog gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
378b7(ta): / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje hU ste hU zhes sgrogs// thig le nyag gcig man ngag ni// sgom du
379a1(ta): ci yang med pa las// yengs pa med pa'i man ngag bstan// rdo rje 'phrul gyi snying po sku// rdo rje skye med 'gag med thugs// rdo rje bzhi
379a2(ta): bskor ma yengs bzlas// rdo rje rdo rje shib bu dang // gnod byed 'gog pas a tir bzlas// sems la sku gsal bla mA dran// rdo rje bzlas pa rang bar bzlas//
379a3(ta): rdo rje shi ba bu bzlas pa ni// so dang mchu ni mnyam sbyar la// lce yi rtse mos cung zad bskul// tshig gi sgra ni sbyangs pa'i glu// rdo rje shib bu'i bzlas pa'o//
379a4(ta): 'gog pa dag ni bzlas pa ni// nad dang gdon ngos gzung ba las// gtong 'phang smad sgyur bar nas rton// bsregs bsad char dbab mchod par dbul// 'gyus
379a5(ta): dran 'dzin chags rnam rtog 'gog/ 'gyus dran 'dzin chags gang snang la// yod med gang 'dug ci 'dug pa rtag/ nga rang snying po rang byung chos// gzugs med srog
379a6(ta): chod snang ba med// tshig med ming bral snying po rig/ a ni skye med bzlas pa'o// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags kun// gang zlos snying po hUM gi rta//
379a7(ta): yi ge 'bru yi sgra ltar ro// chen po 'thug po ring po thung // drang po bzlog pa rnal ma rnams// kun kyang snying po hUM gi sgra// gsang bar bzlas dang 'brug ltar sgrogs//
379b1(ta): rang sor tshig gsal mchod pa bzlas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ bzlas lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// /
379b2(ta): / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badz+ra sa twa khyod// ngo bo'i rgyud dang tshig gi rgyud// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po dang // lta ba phyogs dang bral ba'i don// ma
379b3(ta): bris dkyil 'khor snang ba'i mchog/ dbang mchog snying po rang byung dbang // 'gyus dran 'dzin chags yangs med sgrogs// dam tshig 'khu 'brigs spangs pa'i gdengs//
379b4(ta): spyod pa shugs byung tshul 'chos med// 'phrin las 'gro don rdzogs pa yi// gsang sngags snying po hUM gi rgyud// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa yin// yongs su rdzogs pas
379b5(ta): ma tshang med// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa las// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// 'di ni a ti snying po'i rgyud// gsang sngags bstan pa dar ba'i dus// dus
379b6(ta): kyi snyigs ma las ngan byed// rgyal po mnga' 'bri dmangs kun rang dgar spyod// de dus nga yi rgyud 'di dar bar 'gyur// ma nyams gsang thub re dogs bral// grol
379b7(ta): bar 'gyur te the tsom med// chos kyis zong byed slob dpon 'phrag tshongs byed// sdig la mi 'dzim tshul 'a chos dge ba byed// mched kyi khrel med slob dpon mnyes mi
380a1(ta): byin/ dngos su ma rjes 'brangs ngan song dmyal ba'i gnas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi don bsdus pa dang dar dus
380a2(ta): kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // kun byed ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor tshogs badz+ra sa twa khyod nyon cig/ snying po gong du gyur pas sangs
380a3(ta): rgyas thugs// rtsa ba 'dus pas sems can gzhi// myang 'das thugs la 'khor ba'i dbugs// gong du gyur dang gong na med// rtse mo zang thal rin chen tog/ sangs
380a4(ta): rgyas thams cad dgongs pa gcig/ sems can kun gyi yid du gnas// 'khor ba'i bsham du 'dus pa yin// 'gro drug khams gsum hUM gi skad// mi mthun pa dang /
380a5(ta): ga la srid// stong pa sems kyi rang rtsal yin// rtse mor gar 'gyur rtsa ba bsham du 'dus// dus kyi tha ma snying po dar bar nges// gces pa'i man ngag bla med snying po'i
380a6(ta): rgyud/ snyigs ma'i dus su chos 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// de ltar chos 'di 'byung ba 'di// byin gyis brlabs
380a7(ta): kyi 'byung mi 'byung // gang gi sa phyogs dar bar 'gyur// gang zag gang gis 'dzin pa lags// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang bas 'di skad gsungs// byin gyis brlabs
380b1(ta): kyis 'byung bar 'gyur// nga nyid sprul pa rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'chang ba bar ma khyod// khyod nyid sprul pa rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i ming la rdo rje'i sku// rgyal rigs
380b2(ta): o n+ya na rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma des// sa 'dul bod yul rgyal po dang // blon po sprul sku cig la gtad// de nas skal ldan rims brgyud nas// gsang
380b3(ta): sngags bka' 'chol dus su dar// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ chos kyi dar sa 'byung dus kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// /
380b4(ta): yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// snying po'i chos min rang byung 'di// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// thams cad mi 'byung gang yang
380b5(ta): med// 'gyur ba med pas gser dang 'dra// gang ltar sprad kyang snying po nyid// rang byung gzhi na sa nam mkha' 'dra// stong pa dngos por snang bar byed// sgyu ma
380b6(ta): mkhan gyi dpe dang 'dra// gcig las thams cad sprul par snang // rgya mtshor gza' skar sha ra ba 'dra// za ba la ma 'dres kun gsal chos// nam mkha' sprin
380b7(ta): 'dus thog dang 'dra// dngos po'i rdzas kun rlag par byed// sman gyi rgyal po gze ta 'dra// gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dra//
381a1(ta): log lta dgra bgegs 'dul bar byed// nam mkhar nyi ma shar ba 'dra// ma rig sdig sgrib sbyong ba'o// sman gyi rgyal po ga pur 'dra// rtogs dang ma
381a2(ta): rtogs khyad par che// thang ka mnyam po'i chu dang 'dra// gang dang gang yang gdul bya'i chos// snying po 'di ni kun gyi las// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod ston// 'di ni srung ba
381a3(ta): bla na med// hU brjod dpa' bo gzhan gyi min// hUM sgoms rdo rje 'jigs dral med// hUM rtogs nam mkha' gcad du med// dri chen dri chu byang sems bzang // gla ba tshil chen gu
381a4(ta): gul dang // rta bon mu zi bsku zhing brtags// sman drug pu ra ma ka ra ni// tsha grang gnyis la sbyar zhing btang // rtsa chu gnyis kyis na dngos gzung // srin bya'ug pa pha rog mig
381a5(ta): mig mthong gdon ngos bzung ba'i rdzas// gu gul rta bon tshal chen ni// gdon ba skad yi dgas kha'aching rdzas// 'o ma can dang tshe ra ma can// sbyin sreg zhi drag gnyis kyi rdzas//
381a6(ta): ro g.ya mthod pa ming dang gzugs// rgya gram dpa' po bco lnga bris// gnan pa rdo rje kha non rdzas// khrag sna dug sna sngo dang chu// log rtog rlung la bskur ba'i rdzas// chungs kar
381a7(ta): nyungs nag mda' phur khrag/ srog la zor thun pa sad pa'i rdzas// hU bsgoms hUM brjod ma dpung mtshon// thog ris rdegs mdzub ser ba bzlog/ ces gsungs so//
381b1(ta): rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// ston pas gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di la// mtshan du ji skad gzung bar bgyi// 'khor tshogs 'di la nges par gsungs// zhes zhus
381b2(ta): pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad snying po don gyi rgyud// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'dus pa'i chos// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba'i
381b3(ta): snying po chos med ston// gsang ba snying po'i rgyud du zung // rang byung snying po rdo rje ston// rang byung snying po rgyud du zung // 'og min gnas kyi dang por gsungs// rdo rje yang rtse'i
381b4(ta): rgyud du zung // zhes gsungs nas// bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags 'di ni bab cho la spyod// dam tshig nyams pa'i chos byed kun// na rag yi dgas lkugs/
381b5(ta): par shog/ mi bzang srin po bdud mo yis// grogs dang bu tsha 'khor du shog/ yid 'ong grogs dang bral bar shog/ ming btags sde brgyad lha srin gyis// rtag tu
381b6(ta): 'tshe zhing snying 'byin shog/ byams pa'i gnyen med mi rnams kun// rtag tu dgra yi las byed shog/ bu dang slob bu bslabs 'gying ste// srin bya'i skad bzhin snyen med/
381b7(ta): shog/ 'byung ba 'khrugs pas 'du ba'i nad// rtag tu lus la 'byung bar shog/ gdug pa klu dang dgras spar dang // rtag tu lus sems bde bar shog/ bla ma mnyes byed/
382a1(ta): lus srog nor// reg pa dam tshig gtsang mar bsrun// 'khor drug yangs phyir mi ldog par// dge sbyod grogs rnyed 'khor rnyed shog/ lha srin
382a2(ta): 'khor byed par chod sel bar shog/ mgo nag mi byams rgyal po'i bka' bzhi na shog/ nad med lus bde nyams myong rang 'bar shog/ klu 'go bsod nams dge rgyas shog
382a3(ta): ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ dpe dang bsrung rdzas rgyud mtshan smon lam gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas ston pa kun byed rdo rje/
382a4(ta): 'chang 'od gsal kha dog snying po'i 'od// hUM las kha dog lngar bstan nas// rdo rje 'chang ba dang po'i sku ru bzhugs// hUM las ha byung a ru rtogs// zhes gsungs
382a5(ta): so// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'khor dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi lha brgya stong gis me tog dang mchod pa'i tshogs
382a6(ta): kyis mchod kyin mngon par bstod pa/ ston pa'i ston pa rdo rje 'chang // kun tu bzang po kun byed sku// snying pa'i chos 'chang rdo rje thugs// snying po skye med sku la bstod//
382a7(ta): 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgyud bshad ngo mtshar che// rang byung snying po'i sku de rdo rje rgyud// gsang ba mngon du ston pa man ngag chos// 'khor tshogs 'di la gnang po yi rang ngo //
382b1(ta): zhes gsungs so// ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ kye ma kyi hud kyi hud ces gsungs shing // mi snang mi 'khor rdo rje 'chang //
382b2(ta): phyir mi ldog pa kun tu bzang // snying po chos dbyings rdo rje'i sku// byin gyis brlabs kyis gzung bar zhus// zhes gsungs nas/ rgyud 'di bsdus nas sprul pa'i sku
382b3(ta): pad+ma 'byung gnas la gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
382b4(ta): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pa ye ke tu hr-i da ya ta na tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje yang tog gi snying po'i rgyud ces bya ba/
382b5(ta): dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po rang rig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen sku// chos dbyings snying po rang byung gnas// snga phyi
382b6(ta): med pa snying po'i don// rang byung sprul pa'i nyid kyi 'khor// rang byung snying po rtogs pa'i chos// gcig las thams cad 'byung bar rtags// yang dang bral ba'i
382b7(ta): thig le ni// ci yang yin par thams cad grol/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje drag mo nyi zla'i gdong //
383a1(ta): sems dpa' rnal 'byor ma sogs kyis// ston pa nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying po nyi zla gas la bde//
383a2(ta): 'khrul pa log lhas pablo drug bsgribs// thugs rjes snying po me sel ba// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ci// zhes nus pas/ de nas kun bzang
383a3(ta): rdo rje 'chang // byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor rnams la// chos sku snying por sku bzhengs nas// rang byung snying po kun gyi gni// 'khor tshogs khyed la legs
383a4(ta): par bstan// de bzhin gsung nyid ming med de// 'khor ba'i sems can drang po'i phyir// tshig lam rkyen gyis mtshon te bstan// ces gsungs so// rdo
383a5(ta): yang tog gi rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa zhus lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad
383a6(ta): gsol/ kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang // snying po'i don 'di ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma//
383a7(ta): snying po lhun grub kun gyi gzhi// rang byung du ma snying pa'i rtsal// nga ni rang byung snying po yin// thams cad nga las byung ba yin// nor bu rin chen yon tan 'dra//
383b1(ta): nga ni snying po kun gyi gzhi// da rtogs pas ni grol ba de// chos sku yul med phyogs dang bral// yul snang sangs pas rtogs pa rgyas// ming tshogs grol bas/
383b2(ta): ye shes rgyas// skyes 'gyur ming med nga yi sku// nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer 'byung // chos sku'i snying po thugs rje 'byung // byin gyis brlabs su snang ba yin// nga nyid
383b3(ta): sprul pa rdo rje sems// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' nga // de nyid sprul pa thub pa drug/ 'gro drug sems can rnams la snang // ma rig 'khrul pa rigs drug nga //
383b4(ta): bde gshegs snying po 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'gro drug sems can snying po khyab// nga las 'byung ba ma shes 'khrul// sa chu me rlung snod rten nga // nam mkha' khyab pa'i
383b5(ta): rang byung nga // gling bzhi gling phran ri rab nga // snod bcud snang ba gzung 'dzin nga // nga ni snying po hUM gi rtsal// 'khor 'das gnyis kang yi rtsa la// 'gag pa
383b6(ta): med pa gnyis kang // rigs lnga sangs rgyas nga yi sku// de yi yul lda nga yi gdangs// ye shes rnam lnga nga yi rtogs// spyan lnga rang rang mthong bas spyan//
383b7(ta): rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// hUM las 'og min sems dpar snang // rigs drug thub drug gdul byang // dug lnga phung po 'byung lnga nga // phyogs lnga 'dre lnga sde brgyad dang /
384a1(ta): phyogs skyong rgyu gar gza' brgyad dang // lha gru nor bu rin chen nga// nad lnga lo zla nag zangasang // phyogs lnga kha dog dbang pong // don snying yan
384a2(ta): lag sha rus nga // nga ni don gyi snying po hUM// gzhi rtags kun gyi dbugs dang skad // gzhi ni snying po chos kyi dbyings// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las
384a3(ta): chos nyid kyi 'byung sa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang // de ltar chos nyid snying
384a4(ta): po 'di// 'khor 'das gyes pa ji lta bu// de yi dus 'di gang las byung // zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro khyod
384a5(ta): snying po gnyis med gzhi ma las// rang byung rang rlung 'gag pa med// snying po 'gag med ha rlung rtsal// de nyid rang gdangs 'od du 'byung // snying po hUM gi rang byung yin//
384a6(ta): kha dog sna tshogs gzha' ltar gsal// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags rnam shes dengs// 'od mthong de rang rang byung rtogs// phar ltas pas ni tshur la gsal// ye shes snying
384a7(ta): po 'khrul rtsa chod// srog la mi 'khor chog mi dgos// rang byung ye shes snying po grol// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags bag chags med// dge ba ma bsags sangs
384b1(ta): rgyas ngas// chos min snying po chos kyi sku// srog snying la shan de dus byed// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// rang byung snying po kha dog las// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags
384b2(ta): sgyu mar snang // rang byung ma rtogs bag ma chags// sgyu ma mchod chags sdang med// dug ldam rgyas ye ma shes// rgyu ma stong pa rgya yis thebs// khyod nyid sa bcu'i byang
384b3(ta): chub sems dpar snang // rigs lnga sku ldar bar ma // yar gzigs mar mthong so 'tshams pa// rgyu ma rang grol snying por rtogs// rdo rje sems dpa' chos sku
384b4(ta): yin// sgyu ma sgyu mar spyod pa longs sku yin// sgyu ma 'gag med cir yang ston// sprul sku thub drug ci yang ston// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma des// thugs rje dbang po theg pa
384b5(ta): rims/ blo dang sbyar te snying po ston// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das 'khrul pas gyes pa las sku gsum sangs rgyas lugs kyi le'u
384b6(ta): ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // sku gsum de ltar sangs rgyas nas// 'gro drug khams
384b7(ta): gsum sems can 'di// ce las 'khor ba'i ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma//
385a1(ta): snying po rang byung 'od du shar// snying po rang rtsa la rang byung yin// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags bag tu chags// gzung 'dzin dug lnga chags sdang gis// srog dang
385a2(ta): snying pos gnyis su 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor ba'i skyon// nyon mongs rang gis rang bcings 'byung // dper na srin gyi bal blangs des// srin gyi yan lag dbang po
385a3(ta): bcings// bde bar 'dod pas sdug bsngal byung // sdig pa ma bsags 'khor bar 'khor// las dang las kyi 'bras bur 'byung // 'gyus dran 'dzin chags gzhi yis sgrog
385a4(ta): phung po khams dang skye mched rtas// mtho ris ngan song dge sdig las// bde gshegs snying po 'khor ba'i rgyu// lus dang sems gnyis rtag tu sbyong // dgra gnyen gnyis kyi las
385a5(ta): la spyod// snying po rang byung ma rtogs pas// snod bcud gnyis su 'dzin pa rtas// hUM nyid snying po rang byung nyid// goms rtags ngo shes 'dris gnad gtsun// ces gsungs so//
385a6(ta): rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sems can 'khrul tshul gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // srog snying
385a7(ta): gnyis la 'khor ba yi// ma rig 'gro ba nyon mongs de// snying po don la ji ltar sbyar// 'gro ba'i gnas su gang du bsgral// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal
385b1(ta): pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ma rig mig 'byed gdams pa yis// rdza bcag nang gi mar me bzhin// snying po rang byung rang gis rig/ yul med yul du 'dod pa rdza lta bu//
385b2(ta): snying po rang chas mar me 'dra// rang la yod de rang gis bsgribs// gzugs phung gshigs dang rang byung mthong // yul snang gzir dang rang byung 'char// 'gyus dran pa stims dang
385b3(ta): rang byung mthong // 'dzin chags spongs dang rang byung shes// 'gyus dran ma bu'i gdams ngag 'di// 'gyu ba ha rtsa la rang byung rlung // kyus kyis 'grus pas dran pas zin//
385b4(ta): 'gyu ba'i rta la dran pa'i srab// glang tshan lcags kyus bsgyur ba 'dra// rta rgod srab kyis btul ba yin// dran pa sangs pa'i ye shes yin// 'gyu ba'i rtsal gyis dran pa grol//
385b5(ta): yul snang sangs pas rang byung nyams// dran pas zin pa ting 'dzin nyams// chu yis chu ded rgya mtsho'i glong // nyams las 'das pa'i ye shes yin// 'gyus dran sangs na/
385b6(ta): nyams las 'da'// 'dzin pa gang na gang la gtad// cig la las su rung bar gyis// chags pa sangs pa'i rang nyams yin// yul rten bral ba'i rang byung nyams// dran
385b7(ta): pas 'gyub grol te rtse chod nyams// 'dzin pas chags partas te rtse chod nyams// bu gdan dran pas che ste ma yi nyams// ma gnad 'dzin pa'i gnad de rang byung nyams// rlub
386a1(ta): gnad 'gyu ba dran pas so// dran gnad 'dzin pa chags sa gang yang med// ri dgas khyis ded thar pa med// ta la mgo bcad skye ba med// ces
386a2(ta): gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa rtsad gcod kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang // ston pa nyid la 'di skad zhus//
386a3(ta): kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying po bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsnyen bsgrub 'phrin las dam tshig dang // mchod pa byin dbab gsang sngags gang // lta spyod dbang dang ting nge 'dzin//
386a4(ta): bsgrubs pas khyad par grub mtha' rnams// 'khor tshogs nyid la gsal bar zhu// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
386a5(ta): rdorje drag mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// de la gdung bzhi 'phrin las bzhi// sngags kyi yan lag dam tshig gsum// mchod pa'i bye brag bsgrubs pa yis// khyad par grub mtha' snying
386a6(ta): po bstan// ces gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa// rjes 'jug 'phrin las gzhung srang ste// dpa' bo gcig pa'i gzhung 'dzugs na// dur khrod zag gam ci
386a7(ta): khrod dam// grog po lung stong nags kyi gas pa// dben gnas yid dang mthun pa ru// lha 'dre gdug pa mi med der// bla ma yi ma maN+Dal dang // chos skyong maN+Dal lags bshams
386b1(ta): la/ chu gtor gser skyems dkar gtor dang // bden pa bdar zhing dam tshig dbab// spang kong klag cing ci rigs brjod// mtho gzugs mtshams bcad phyi nang par// bla ma yi ma skyabs
386b2(ta): gsol la// ci 'byor yo byad byin gyis brlabs// gtor tshogs dza gad ra ka ta dgod// tshe bum mchod rdzas ci 'byor dgram// de nas rnal 'byor can de yis// sku gsung thugs kyi
386b3(ta): mtshams gcad bya// lha dang bla ma mjal phyag 'tshal// byin dbab rtags dbab dam bca' bya// phyi bshags nang bshags gsang bshags bya// dpa' bo mchod rdzas byin gyis
386b4(ta): brlabs// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// mchod 'bul sman gtor rak+ta dang // longs spyod tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor//
386b5(ta): tshul dang mthun phyir dngos grub dbang // mchod par shags sbyor grol 'phrin las bya// 'jig rten mchod cing gtor ma gtang // dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing rnal 'byor bya// zhes gsungs/
386b6(ta): so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las kyi gzhung gi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas yang / rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad
386b7(ta): gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // rmongs pa gsal ba grol phyir du// gzhung ltar bsgrubs pa rgyas par gsungs// zhes gsol pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa//
387a1(ta): nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// dpa' bo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor des// snying po rang byung gsal byas la// sems dpa' rnam gsum sku yi mtshams//
387a2(ta): rang byung snying po thugs kyi mtshams// hUM zhes brjod pa gsung gi mtshams// bzhi po'i hUM las spro zhing du// 'di skad tshig gi gsal de gdab// hUM/ steng yang hUM gi rang bzhin
387a3(ta): la/ 'og kyang hUM gi rang bzhin 'og/ phyogs mtshams hUM gis rab tu gang // rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pas bltams// mtshon cha sna tshogs ga shog pa can// sku yi mtshams
387a4(ta): las ma 'da' zhig/ hUM steng yang hUM gi rang bzhin la// 'og kyang hU~M gi rang bzhin 'og/ phyogs mtshams hUM gis bltams pa la// thams cad yig 'bru sngags kyi sgra/
387a5(ta): gsung gi mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ hU sku gsung snying po rang byung hUM// rnam par rtog pa nga rang hUM// nga rang hU~M du thams cad gcig/ mi rtog snying po'i mtshams las ma
387a6(ta): 'da' zhig/ hUM snying po rang byung bla ma lha// rang byung snying po sgo phye zhig/ hUM mos shing dad pa'i dam tshig gis// gnyis su med par phyag 'tshal lo// hUM lta bar hUM
387a7(ta): nyid ma rtogs shing // g.yeng ba snying po sgom yun thung // brtson 'grus sgrub pa gzhung ma tshugs// ma rig rang ma rtogs pa bshags// de nas gtor ma dza gang khrag/ 'byor
387b1(ta): pa'i tshogs dang chos rdzas rnams// hUM brjod 'od zhu spros bsdu yis// phyi nang gsum du byin gyis brlabs// rigs 'dzin la sogs byin dbab dang // ye dam mkha' 'gro byin dbab
387b2(ta): bya// rnal 'byor rtags tshe khrag tshil byug/ dam bca' bla ma lha dang bdag/ 'gro don bya bar sems dpa' bskyed// dam bsre sems bskyed sdom pa gzung // zhes gsungs
387b3(ta): so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngon 'gro mtshams kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gzhung spyod
387b4(ta): dam gtsang rgyas bu des// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// ngo bo des tshig dbye ba dpe// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu mi ting 'dzin rna
387b5(ta): gsum sbyar// sems dpa' rnam gsum gsal phyir ro// zad sar skyal ba gdams ngag yin// de don gsal btab 'di skad brjod// hUM ma nor ma bcos snying po nyid//
387b6(ta): rgyu rkyen skyo med stong pa hUM// hUM yongs la khyab pas bri bkol med// 'dod pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' hUM// hUM rang byung snying po klong yangs nas// thams cad bskyed pa
387b7(ta): rang byung hUM// hU~M las brum 'gros 'og min gnas// phyi med nang med gzhal yas khang // hUM thabs dang shes rab skyon med de// mi 'jigs 'dul ba dregs pa'i
388a1(ta): gdan/ hUM rang byung snying po 'phrul gyi sku// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan lha// gang snang 'phrin las yi dam lha// hUM 'og min chos
388a2(ta): dbyings snying po'i mkha'// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i 'khor// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol// hUM snying po chos sku rang byung lha/
388a3(ta): rdo rje 'chang dang rin chen pad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro karma mkha' 'gro dang // phyag 'tshal lha la skyabs su mchi// hUM sems can nyi zla pad+ma'i steng // rdo rje de bzhin rin chen
388a4(ta): pad// karma rigs kyi yum dang bcas// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// hUM rang byung gdod nas dag pa ste// rtsa brgyad snying po nyid kyi sman//
388a5(ta): bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba dang // mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i tshogs la 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs dbang dang dngos grub gsol// hUM gu ru badz+ra a mr-i ta khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM oM/ hUM hU~M hUM
388a6(ta): AHhUM hUM hUM hUM/ phyi nang gsang gsum tshogs kyi las// phyi yi mchod pa rin po che// 'dod yon dbang po lnga po 'bul// gzugs sgra ro sogs mchod par bzhes//
388a7(ta): hUM nang gi mchod pa rin po che// dbang po rnam shes rnam shes yul// thugs dam bskongs gyur rin po che// mthong snang dag par bzhes su gsol// hUM gsang
388b1(ta): ba'i mchod pa rin po che// 'grus dang dran dang 'dzin dang chags// srog dang snying po sbyor sgrol 'di// snying po skye 'gag med par bzhes// hUM snod kyi 'jig rten gtor ma'i
388b2(ta): snod// bcud kyi 'jig rten bcud dang khrag/ 'dod yon gtor ma tshogs su 'bul// bdud rtsi 'dod yon mchod par bzhes// hUM lus kyi 'jig rten gtor ma'i snod//
388b3(ta): sha khrag rus pa tshil bu rkang // dbugs chen gtor ma sman rag tshogs// phung po yan lag mchod par bzhes// hUM gsang ba dbang po yul drug snod// rnam shes
388b4(ta): dbang po 'gyus dran 'dzin// chags pa gtor ma ra ga ta khrag/ bdud rtsi tshogs chen mchod par bzhes// hUM gu ru ba ling ta khA hi/ hUM badz+ra ba ling ta khA hi/ hUM rak+ta/
388b5(ta): hUM a mr-i ta/ hUM tsit+ta/ hUM go ro tsa na/ hUM ma hA maM sa/ hUM ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ ho hi hau/ hUM/ hUM ye nas snying po chos kyi sku/
388b6(ta): gdod nas skye 'gag rang byung hUM// thams cad rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku// 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rang byung skye med drang po'i gsung // thams cad
388b7(ta): hUM du sgrogs mdzad hUM// snying po'i rtsa sngags mdo rgyud mchog/ kun kyang gdams par sgrogs la bstod// hUM nyag gcig zang thal chos las 'das// gcig tu mi
389a1(ta): rtog du ma med// 'grus dran med par 'dzin chags med// gnyis med rdo rje thugs la bstod// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ gzhung mchod pa'i
389a2(ta): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// de nas rjes 'jug slob ma la// gsang sngags hUM gi dbang bskur
389a3(ta): bya/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang dang ni// gtor ma zhal zas tshogs dang phud// rak+Sha mar me tshe yi dbang // rdzas dang dar ma chags shing dbang // lha sgom spyod pa'i dbang
389a4(ta): bskur bya// rdo rje rgyal po rjes 'jug gis// zhus gnang dbang yon gdams pa bstan// dang po dbang la 'jug tsam na// dkyil 'khor dbang rdzas lta ba zhu// yon
389a5(ta): dbul dbang bskur gdams pa zhus// de don zhu ba 'di skad gsol// hUM bde chen snying po'i pho brang du// thugs rjes gnang 'tshal bstan par zhu// bdag lta nyon mongs
389a6(ta): snying rje la// ma rig mig 'byed gsal bar zhu// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// ma rig ling tog gsal bar zhu// 'jug khrid gdams pas chos bstan zhu// smras
389a7(ta): pa'i man ngag bstan par zhu// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// bla ma rdo rje'i bka' drin gyis// gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ltos// hUM rang byung snying
389b1(ta): po'i dkyil 'khor 'di// gcig bltas pas ni thams cad mthong // rig pa'i me tog 'dir gtor la// mig 'di dbye yis legs par ltos// hUM badz+ra pra be sha phaT/ thugs
389b2(ta): kyi maN+Da kha pho brang ngo // de nas rigs kyi bu de la// rdo rje rgyal pos dbang bskur bya// hUM gtor ma ye shes phyag rgya che// gang mos lha ru byin brlabs
389b3(ta): nas// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskar bas// snying po hUM don rtogs par shog/ hUM hUM hUM/ ba ling dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa man hUM/ hUMskal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// dza gad
389b4(ta): a mr-i ta yi dbang bskur bas// 'gro ba'i nad sel ye shes lnga// 'gro ba 'bangs su 'du bar shog/ hUM a mr-i te a g+hi/ hUM dmar che na rak+ta'i dbang bskur te// thugs
389b5(ta): rje chags pa rang grol nas// shes rab rang byung me 'bar te// mkha' 'gro dbang du 'du bar shog/ hUM rak+ta/ hUM/ skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// zhal zas tshogs kyi dbang
389b6(ta): bskar 'di// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yi// bza' btung longs spyod tshogs rdzogs shog/ hUM bun dza a b+hi Shiny+tsa man/ hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la//
389b7(ta): zhugs mar snang ba'i dbang bskur bas// rang gsal snying po rang rig sgron// ye shes rang byung rang snang shog/ hUM A lo ke a b+hi Shiny+tsa man/ hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu
390a1(ta): khyod la// snying po mi 'gyur tshe yi dbang bskur bas// bar chod rkyen med tshe dang dbang thang rgyas// rdo rje hUM gi tshe dbang thob par shog/ hUM badz+ra A yu a b+h+ya/
390a2(ta): Shiny+tsa man/ hUM badz+ra hUM bud+d+ha aM/ hUM rad na traM/ hUM pad+ma hI/ hUM karma ha/ de sku gsung thugs kyi dbang // rig pa 'dzin la dbang bskur gyis// hUM/ phyag rgya rang byung 'phrul/
390a3(ta): gyi sku/ bde ba rang byung hU~M gi sngags// ting 'dzin snying po rang byung hUM// skye med sku gsung thugs su shog/ oM AHhUM/ dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa man/ hUM mtha' bral mi
390a4(ta): yengs rgyun du spyod// mi 'phrog mi rtsol re dogs med// rdo rje 'chang ba'i chos nyid no// skal ldan khyod kyis rtogs par nog/ hUM d+hurma d+hAt+ta a b+hiSha mya man+ta/ d+hu rig pa
390a5(ta): rtogs pa rang gi dbang // rang chas snying po sdig sgrib grol// srog snying yul min gnyis las grol// chos min snying po rtogs par shog/ hUM dz+nyA na d+hI da a b+hi Shany+tsa man/ hUM
390a6(ta): chos rnams thams cad bzhi po'i hUM// brda dag bstan pas de nyid rig/ rang byung 'grus dran lam du slongs// 'dzin chags rang grol 'bras bu hU~M// de nas 'chad pa'i dbang
390a7(ta): bskur byas// hUM rdo rje 'chang ba rigs kyi bu// snying po 'gro ba yongs la khyab// de nyid rang byung hUM du gnas// de nyid khyod kyi tshig rgyud ston// ces gsungs so// rdorje
390b1(ta): yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// 'phrin las
390b2(ta): bcol ba'i rim pa ni// dpa' bo gcig pa'i cha lag ste// hUM rdo rje 'chang ba nga yi sku// rdo rje zhi khro las byung // lha mo mdzes ma sna tshogs nga // gtum chen mtshon
390b3(ta): thogs nga nyid hUM// hUM las gyur pas bde chen hUM// rba phaT ya dang b+h+yo yi dza// ru lu kI la ya ma// snying po thams cad nga yi sngags// hUM zhi 'gyur tshe dang dbang thang
390b4(ta): rgyas/ dbang bsdus thams cad rlag par byed// srog snying gzer ba dgra dang bgegs// ming med srog dang bral bar mdzod// hUM raM las me byung me chen lnga// dug
390b5(ta): lnga 'dre lnga phung po sreg/ sna tshogs dmigs te 'od kyis bsregs// rang byung me ni nga rang hUM// hUM khaM las chu 'gyur rgya mtsho gling // klu chen klu bran sa bdag gnyan//
390b6(ta): nyon mongs snang ming sgrib pa 'khru// rang byung chu sdud dang rang hUM// hUM yaM las rlung byung dang po'i rlung // 'gyu ba rlung chen spro bsdu rlung // snang med rang byung dngos med hUM//
390b7(ta): hUMri rab chen po dpa' bo hU~M// ri bsten rdo rje rgya gram gser// lcags ri pho brang lha yi 'og/ khro bo chen po 'khor bcas hU~M// hUM rdo rje phur pa mtshon cha hUM/ nyungs
391a1(ta): / sa na yo// klu ga na na ts+tshor dpal// mar la du nga pod+d+ha// denas gtor ma sgyus spyod// drang dang ga spyo /
391a2(ta): hUM mkha' 'gro rigs bzhi rnal 'byor ma// skyes bu ging dang ging phran tshogs// dbang phyug nyi shu bran mo brgyad// ma bdun sring bzhi po nya rnams// 'bar ba bstan ma
391a3(ta): mtha' skyong hUM// hUM ka yi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// gal te gtor ma ma blangs na// sngon gyi dam bca' 'gal la re// nyams pa'i chad pa byung nga re// de bas gtor
391a4(ta): ma 'di long la// dam tshig skyongs shig 'gal byed sgrol// de nas dngos grub blang dang gtor ma'o// rbad dang gtor ma sta ru gzung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang
391a5(ta): tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las yongs su mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/
391a6(ta): 'dzab 'di ma yangs snying po bzlas// hUM hUM/ b+h+rUM badz+ra hUM/ oM bud+d+ha hUM hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma hUM hUM hUM/ swa rad na hUM hUM hUM/ ha ka ra ma hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra DA ki ni hUM te te te na hUM
391a7(ta): hUM hUM hUM ra da na DA ki ni hUM/ te te te na hUM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M pad+ma DA ki na taM te te na hU~M/ hU~M hUM hUM kar ma DA kau ni hU~M te te te na hUM/ hUM hUM hU~M bud+d+hA nA ki ni hU~M ti te te na hUM/ skabs su pho mo'i snying po
391b1(ta): bzlas// oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM hUM/ gcig dang gsum dang lnga pa'i sngags// dus min rgyun du bzlas pa yin// ces pa'i gsang sngags snying po'o// sngags kyi grong khyer
391b2(ta): sbrel ba ni// dpa' bo rang byung 'di ltar gdags// hUM dang ri rab can du sprul// phaT dang rlung chud can du sbrel// rbad dang gri khug can du sbrel// yang dang mtshon cha can du sbrel
391b3(ta): b+h+yo dang g.yab dar can du sbrel// dza dang lcags kyu can du sbrel// ri bo chen po'i mgul lam rtser// gnan dang sbrel te rgya gram mo// gdug pa tsher ma 'o ma can// rno pa la
391b4(ta): / ro dang sbrel ba'o// nyungs kar rdo lcags khrag dug dang // mA ra ya thun b+h+yo sbrel ba ni// las ka rdzogs pa'i hUM bskor ro// kA ya bAka dang tsit+ta hUM/ dngos grub dbang dang a li
391b5(ta): sbrel/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngags dang sbrel so'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
391b6(ta): nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// dbab gcad sbyor ba rdzogs par gyis// rang byung snying po hU~M la bya// 'di ni 'phrin las yongs kyi rgyud// rtsa ba nor bu ran chen
391b7(ta): no// 'grus dran 'dzin chags las kyi mtha'// rdo rje yang tog las kyi khrigs// lag len dmar byang yang tog rgyud// kun dang 'brel ba'i snying po'i rgyud// rtsa ba thabs
392a1(ta): kyi rgyud du gsungs// 'di ni 'jug tu lag gis gtad// des kyang snying dang mig tu rtsis// sbas pa'i snying po gsang dbang 'di// dam tshig
392a2(ta): / gzhung srong yul khams dgra/ bdag gis mnyes 'pham gsum blang // bstan pa 'jig na las 'di bya// snying po 'khrul gyi skur bsgoms la// ngag kyang mi bsdang hUM sgra
392a3(ta): bgrang // yid kyang mi bsdad pho nya sgom// yul khams gsal bar byas la dbang // mdze thod sha khrag sngo sna tshogs// bong nga nyungs kar mu zi gnan// gu gul rabs tshad
392a4(ta): gri'o yi khrag/ hUM nA ga tsa pe ni ra hUM la sa ha/ hUM nA ga tsa pa ni ra hUM laM phrom/ hUM nA ga tsa pa ra hUM la chu dril phrom phrom phog/ yul khams phung bar the tshom med// zhag brgyad bsnyen la
392a5(ta): bzhi ru bsgrub// zhag gsum la sbyor dbab pa'i las// gtor ma 'ong ba'i dkyil du bskyal// khrag dang nyungs kar 'ong mtha' bskor// bong nga mu zi gu gul gyis// yul lha
392a6(ta): srer srun srungs ma bsnol// thod pa brdabs la khrag kyang gtor// ri rtser phyin la gos brdab thod pa bsgril// rgyu 'jug ldog par shes par gyis// lha srin kun la gtor mthong //
392a7(ta): 'dis ni thams cad chen la phebs// zhes gsungs so// de nas bsrung ba'i las byas na// dpa' bo gcig pa'i skur gsal te// rdo rje 'chang ba khro chen
392b1(ta): des/ seng ldeng zhing rtsi ba hUM bris la// gang dmigs yul phyogs bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bos gtams bsams la// yul sde lha tshogs phyogs bcu la// me 'bar 'od
392b2(ta): zhu gzhan 'byol bsam// hUM hUM hUM ba shang ling ling zlog zlogs ma ya/ 'di ni gang 'dod me tog 'od// 'bras bu smin par the tsom med// byol te 'gro bar rgyal bas gsungs//
392b3(ta): rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ dbab gcad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma//
392b4(ta): rjes su 'jug pa dang bsren// bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs byas la// de nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad zhu// bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba nyid// rdo rje'i sku yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag kyang
392b5(ta): rab tu 'jug lags na// thugs rje chen pos dgongs nas ni// bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// rdo rje gsung gis bdag kyang thugs rjes bdag la gnang // rdo rje thugs
392b6(ta): kyi dkyil bdag kyang // thugs rjes bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// gnang ba sbyin zhing sman thogs la// yi dam rdo rje bla ma/
392b7(ta): dang / rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la// lus dang srog la bab gyur kyang // zhe sdang mnar sems mi bskyed do// 'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste// dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig
393a1(ta): oM i dan na ra kan/ zhes lce stangs su bzhag go// hUM lung dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// snod dang ldan pa'i rjes 'jug la// yi dam snying po gsal
393a2(ta): phog la/ sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// 'di ni gsung gi dam tshig ste// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ oM i dan na ra kan hUM thun mong ma yin gsang
393a3(ta): chen ni/ gzhan la nams kyang bstan mi bya// 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// dam tshig mchog las ma 'da' zhig/ oM i dan na ra kan/ bdud rtsi lce la bzhag ste/
393a4(ta): g+he'i dam tshig dpog go// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig 'di// ma nyams srungs na dam tshig ni// bdud rtsi lce la bzhag pa yis// snying gi dkyil du babs nas kyang /
393a5(ta): sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// dus la mi ltos da lta thob// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum nyams na// sman mchog bdud rtsi a mr-i ta// lce la bzhag kyang snying la bab// lcags
393a6(ta): kyi sdig pa mgo dgu yis// rwa rtse bco brgyad cig gyur nas// srog rtsa bcad de na rag gnas// de bas dam tshig ma nyams bsrungs// de nas yon tan bla ma mnyes// sdom
393a7(ta): pa gzung ste smon lam gdab// lus srog gces pas mchod byas la// dam bca' smon lam 'di skad do// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // snying po rtogs pas sangs
393b1(ta): rgyas pas// 'bras bu grol ba de bzhin du// bdag kyang snying po dbyar dam len// rjes 'jug brlabs nas rjes su sgrub// 'das pa'i rgyal bas byin gyis rlobs// ma byon pa yi
393b2(ta): sangs rgyas kyang // snying po rgyud nas grol thar nas// ting 'dzin snying po dbyar dam lan// rjes su brlabs nas rjes su sgrub// ma byon rgyal bas byin gyis rlobs// da ltar
393b3(ta): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // snying po ngo shes rtogs nas grol// ting 'dzin snying po dbyar dam len// rjes su brlabs nas rjes su sgrub// da ltar rgyal bas byin gyis
393b4(ta): rlobs// de nas gzhung srang dbang bskur bya// gtor ma btang zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sems bskyed sdom pa'i le'u
393b5(ta): ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje drag mo khro gnyer ma// bzhi cha ngos 'dzin thabs
393b6(ta): re che// 'gyus dran 'dzin chags pa dus kyis// skad cig ma 'di thabs myur bas// dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas// gtsun thabs lus ngag yid gsum gces//
393b7(ta): srog rtsol sdom pa thabs chen// rang byung 'khrul pa bshin pa'i chos// yul min gnyis dang bral ba gces// skad cig ma la blta ba yin// mthong bas kun gyi rtsa ba chod//
394a1(ta): tshegs chung man ngag ston pa gces// 'phrang bu chug la cig la bsdus// gzhi nyid snying po rtogs 'gris kyis// gdeng dang ldan par ma gyur na//
394a2(ta): gol ba'i sa dang ldang ba'i ro// ldog pa'i dus dang slebs pa'i tshad// srog snying man ngag med par ni// dmag dpon med pa'i dmag mi 'dra// grogs kyi yi ge med pa ni//
394a3(ta): dmag mi med pa'i dmag dpon 'dra// rgyan gyi yi ge med pa ni// go mtshon med pa'i dmag mi 'dra// snying po'i gnad dang srog gi gnad// gcig ni srog la gnyis ni ming //
394a4(ta): gsum ni grogs la bzhi ni rgyan// mgo ni chod la gzhug ma thogs// gzhug mchod la mgo bo thogs// skyed pa chod las stod smad khyer// khog tu tshang la khog tu dkrug
394a5(ta): ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ nyams blang srog snying gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje
394a6(ta): mkha' 'gro drag mo yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'tshang // 'bras bu sangs rgyas grub mtha' gang // rgyud kyi dpe tshan ji ltar lags//
394a7(ta): tha ma su yi lag tu gtad// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// 'bras bu gser dang de nyid ska// snying
394b1(ta): po rang grol chos kyi sku// yul snang sangs pa'i ming bral yin// sangs rgyas sa 'di 'di ltar 'thun// chu dang chu nyid 'dres pa'am// ma 'dres mtsho yi gza' skar 'dra// nam
394b2(ta): mkha'i mtha' bzhin tshad las 'das// thugs rje 'byung ba nyi ma 'dra// rang rang yul mthun thabs kyis 'dren// snying po rang chas kun la yod// ye shes gdams pa zur
394b3(ta): gyis bstod// ngo bo'i rgyud dang bka'i rgyud dngape // don gyi rgyud dang gsum du yod// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dpe// 'di ni gdams pa lag len rgyud// dper na nor bu rin
394b4(ta): chen 'dra// snying po thams cad 'byung ba yin// dper na za 'og ber khyim 'dra// snying po ma 'dres yongs su gsal// mu tig sta ra la brgyus pa 'dra// go rims
394b5(ta): 'grel pa rgyud na gsal// dper na nyi ma mun pa 'dra// thams cad 'gal byed ma rig sel// snying po gsal ba mngon du ston// sbas pa mig 'byed rgyud du zung //
394b6(ta): chos nyid snying po bla med rdzong // 'gyus dran 'dzin chags hUM gi 'phrang // bla med rdzong 'phrang rgyud du zung // kun gyi lag len gsal bar ston// snying po gsal byed
394b7(ta): rgyud du zung // gces pa'i man ngag mdzub khrid ston// gces pa dmar khrid rgyud du zung // rtse mo rtse mo 'og min gsungs// rdo rje yang tog rgyud du zung // 'bras bu rdo//
395a1(ta): rje sems dpa' dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas kyis// sprul sku rim par brgyud tshul dang // rgyal blon rig pa can dang sprod// de nas brag dang chu
395a2(ta): gzhung gis// dus kyi tha ma sngags 'chal tshe// bstan pa 'dzin pa the tshom med// ces gsungs so// ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rdo rje sems
395a3(ta): dpa' dang mkha' 'gro ma kun gyis mngon par bsdus nas/ sprul pa'i sku pad+ma 'byung gnas la gtad do// sprul pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / rjes su yi rang nas mngon par
395a4(ta): bstod do// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so// // gser la mthong sems mi bdog ste// zong med
395a5(ta): lag tu gser mi 'khor// chos la mthong sems mi bdog ste// snod med lag tu chos mi 'khor// don gyi snying po gsung rgyud 'di// snying gi phugs gtad tsha gis rgyud re//
395a6(ta): khong gi snying ba ton snying po rdo rje'i rgyud// yang rtse yang tog gdams pa'i mgu rnams// snying gi snying bton snying po hUM gis skor// skal ldan skyongs med pa'i bu la gtod/
395a7(ta): kun gyi gzhi ma byed de nam mkha' khab mig 'dra// sa ni gser gyi gzhi ma byed de rdo dang bshag mas bsgribs// mig gis thams cad blta ste rang ma mthong bas lan//
395b1(ta): snying po nyid dang rtag tu 'grogs te grub mthas pasgribs// e ma rang gis rang bslus rang ka snying re rje// shin tu dkon pa'i rin chen gser kyang byin pa'i sa rdo'o// nor bu rin chen
395b2(ta): snying po ma bu gdams pa rnams// bzhin pa'i snod med sgro skur sgrib pa'i sa stengs gsang // zhes pas pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// nam mkha'i snying po la gdams nas//
395b3(ta): lho nub kyi gling phran du gshegs so// rgya gar skad du/ hr-i da ya badz+ra rat+na sarba e ka tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying
395b4(ta): po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po chos sku ye shes nyag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku rdo rje 'chang ba de// snying po rang 'byung
395b5(ta): nyag gcig gnas// snga phyi med pa snying po'i dus// rang 'byung rang shar bar snang 'khor// gcig pu kun snang gnyis med chos// yang med nyag gcig rdo rje'i sku// nam
395b6(ta): mkha' dbyings dkyil nyi ma bzhin// 'og min rigs brgya nyag gcig snang // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// mkha' 'gro rdo rje drag mo yis// rdo rje/
395b7(ta): 'chang la bskor phyag 'tshal// spyan sngar 'dug ste thal mo sbyar// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kya kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // snying po theg pa nyag gcig kyang // ris
396a1(ta): drug gzugs 'dzin du mar 'khrul// thugs rje chen pos gzigs su gsol// 'og min rdo rje 'khor 'dus la// thams cad gcig la rdo rje'i rgyud/
396a2(ta): gcig las du ma med par gsungs// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// 'og min dbyings su 'dus pa yi// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro
396a3(ta): khyad/ rjes 'jug don du zhu ba legs// snying po nyag gcig rin po che// thams cad gcig pa nga yis bstan// chos thams cad chos nyid gcig/ dbang dang dam tshig dkyil
396a4(ta): 'khor gcig/ 'phrin las mchod pa rnal 'byor gcig/ sngags dang phyag rgya bsnyen bsgrub gcig/ lta ba sgom pa spyod pa gcig/ 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyang gcig/
396a5(ta): dge bcu rnam grangs du mar gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa zhus len sdom gyi le'u ste dang po'o// /
396a6(ta): / de nas rdo rje drag mo yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // de ltar snying po chos cig kyang // bdag cag 'og min dkyil
396a7(ta): 'khor dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gsal bar zhu// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dkyil 'khor rang 'byung dang // mkha' 'gro 'dus
396b1(ta): pa'i 'khor tshogs khyed// chos can chos nyid ro gcig phyir// don gyi snying po chos nyid gcig/ gcig po kun gyi rang bzhin yin// nor bu rin chen yon tan 'dra// du ma
396b2(ta): gang snang gcig yin no// rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas kyang // chos nyid snying po'i dbang po yin// gcig po rang snang rang 'byung bas// gcig po nyid kyang gang na
396b3(ta): 'dug/ yul med pas ni mi bral yin// 'byung ba me chu sa rlung yang // nam mkha'i ngang du ya nas gcig/ sangs rgyas sems can chos nyid gcig/ bde gshegs
396b4(ta): snying pos 'gro kun khyab// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad
396b5(ta): gcig pa'i rgyud las/ chos can nyid gcig par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye nas snying po rang 'byung dbang // /
396b6(ta): rang chas yin pas gzhi ma gcig/ rtogs pas stang 'chang ba yi dbang // sku gsum rim pas khyad par med// dbang gi chu bo lhun grub na// 'gro drug khams gsum thams
396b7(ta): cad la/ til mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// bde gshegs snying po 'bri dkrol med// rang 'byung rang la bstan pas thob// ye nas ye shes rang dbang gcig/ dbul mo ye
397a1(ta): nas gser rten can// rig pa can gyis bstan pas gsar// ya nas rang dbang rang gis thob// skad cig ma la longs spyod ba dag/ 'gro drug ya
397a2(ta): nas snying po'i gzhi// bla ma'i gdams pas rang chas bstan// rang 'byung rang dbang ye nas thob// dbang gi rgyal po ye shes cig/ snying po rang 'byung chos bzhi ldan//
397a3(ta): 'gyus dran 'dzin chags dbang gi chu// snying po rang 'byung chos kyi sku la// phyi nang drang gcad 'gyu ba bcad// dran pa'i ting 'dzin 'dzin pa chad// 'dzin pa 'dzin pa'i rgya thag
397a4(ta): grol// chags pa rang snang ye shes shar// rig pa rang stsa la dbang gcig po// dbang gi ngo bo lhun gyis grub// nges tshig 'khor 'das gnyis ka dbang // 'byed pa rang rab
397a5(ta): 'dod gzhung la// dpe ni rgyal bu 'khyams pa 'dra// snang ba sna tshogs gcig gi dbang // brjod sgra sna tshogs chos gcig dbang // tan bstags thams cad chos nyid
397a6(ta): gcig/ bum pa thams cad shes rab dbang // gsang dbang tshig dbang rnam grangs rnams// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang du gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che
397a7(ta): thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag pa shad bya ba// dam tshig snying po bstan pa ni// ye nas rang
397b1(ta): 'byung snying po'i gzhi// gang snang ming du btags pas kyang // snying po'i dbyings las 'da' mi srid// snying po hUM gi rang bzhin gcig/ rdo rje'i don la g.yangs med//
397b2(ta): dgongs pa 'khu 'phrog dogs pa med// spyod pa chags sdang gzigs snang med// re dogs bral ba'i snying po la// dam tshig 'da' bsrung ye nas med// nyams pa med
397b3(ta): pas dam tshig gcig/ snying po chos skra yul med la// 'gyub gzigs snang 'da' sa med// snying po 'gag med rang sgra la// 'gyu ba'i ming btags smra sa med// snying
397b4(ta): pos 'gyur med chos nyid la// gnyen pos bsgyur zhing bcos su med// sku gsung thugs dam bcas pa la// 'das na sdug bsngal gyis bsreg cing // ma 'das nyon
397b5(ta): mongs dug gsum 'tshig/ ye shes ma lnga rang 'bar la// nyon mongs dug lngas tshig par nges// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad gcig/ dug gsum dam nas sku gsum 'tshig
397b6(ta): dug lnga dam nas ye shes 'tshig/ de ltar gcig gis gcig tshig kyang // snying po gyur dang tshig pa med// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig/
397b7(ta): pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// snying po rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni//
398a1(ta): phye nas dkyil 'khor gang bris kyang // sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bum pa gcig yin no// snying po brda yi dkyil 'khor dang // sems
398a2(ta): dpa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // rang bzhin snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsum// rang 'byung hUM gi dkyil 'khor gcig/ phyi ltar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//
398a3(ta): phyi nang dkyil 'khor gang bris kyang // sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gsal 'debs yin// sems dang ting 'dzin gang bsgoms kyang // snying po 'od kyi
398a4(ta): gsal 'debs yin// snying po rang 'byung chos nyid hUM// dkar dang dmar dang mthing dang ldang // ser dang 'od gsal kun gyi gzhi// sku gsum sku lnga
398a5(ta): yang shas hUM// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum snying po gcig/ bum pa dkyil 'khor rtsa ba ste// brda yi bum pa mtshon pa'i tshes// rtags kyi bum pa snying
398a6(ta): po'i bstan// don gyi bum pa snying po hUM// dkyil 'khor bum pa snying po hUM// chos min skyed dang rdzogs pa min// ye nas dkyil 'khor rang 'byung
398a7(ta): yin/ snying po'i dkyil la 'gyur 'dod hUM// chos las ma byung rang byung hUM// dkyil 'khor chen po rang 'byung hUM// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po
398b1(ta): tshe thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// bsnyen
398b2(ta): pa'i dkyil 'khor sbrel ba ni// snying po rig pa'i chos min la// brda brtags sgra don bshad pa ni// snying po rang 'byung nye bar bsnyen// dad ldan lus sreg gtong phod can//
398b3(ta): snying po nyid la bsnyen pa yin// lta sgom spyod pa dge ba bcu// snying po'i don la bsnyen pa yin// rtsa rlung thig legs la stong bde// snying po nyid la bsnyen pa yin// 'gyu ba
398b4(ta): dran pa rang 'byung shes// dran pa 'dzin pa yangs pa med// chags pa nyams la 'phel 'grib med// nye bar bsnyen pa'i snying po gcig/ rang 'byung snying po chos nyid hUM/
398b5(ta): brda bstan snang ba'i zhen pa log/ yul snang med pas srog dang bral// rtags bstan tshogs drug rang gzugs grol// las rlung ngo sprad ye shes shes// sgra ru bstan
398b6(ta): pas ming med sgra// gang snang ming btags snying po'i dpe// chos nyid don dang rtag tu 'grogs// bsnyen pa'i bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa// rang 'byung rang shar bsnyen pa cig/
398b7(ta): rang snang rang 'bar bsnyen pa cig/ ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba'i dpe// bsnyen pa gang gis bsnyen cig po// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa
399a1(ta): rgyud las// bsnyen pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// sgrub pa/
399a2(ta): sgrub chen snying po gcig/ snying po don gyi gzhi ma la// gtan la 'bebs pa sgrub pa yin// brda bstan snang ba phebs pa yin// rtags bstan gnas lugs gtan la phebs//
399a3(ta): sa brtan thos pa gtan pa lebs/ da d+har shing don du tshig rang byung medags rtsub pa gcig/ chos nyid snying po rang 'byung hUM// brda rnams bstan pas snang ba rtogs// rang 'byung rang snang yul med
399a4(ta): rtogs// rtags su bstan pas gang zag rtogs// rnam shes chos kyi bdag las grol// sgra ru bstan pas tshig tshogs grol// thos pa'i grub mtha' ming med rtogs//
399a5(ta): sgrub pa chen po zhes bya yin// rtsol med re dogs hUM gis chod// snying po chos min rang 'byung hUM// sgrub pa'i sgrub pa chen po gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje
399a6(ta): rin po che'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo
399a7(ta): gcig pa'i 'phrin las ni// dpa' bo gcig pas las kun byed// bya ba thams cad grub pa hUM// snying po las gzhi gcig las med// zhe rgyas dbang dang drag po rnams//
399b1(ta): snying po ma 'gags 'grubs byed// 'gyub rtsal gsum rang chas yin// 'grub yid rtsa snying por chod// nyon mongs chags sdung zhi bar byed// nyon mongs dug lnga rang zhi bas//
399b2(ta): rig pa ye shes rgyas par byed// rang 'byung 'grub dran pas thul// rang 'byung rig pa rang rtsa la dbang // rang dbang thob pas theg chags med// drag po mngon spyod bya ba
399b3(ta): 'grub/ 'phrin las bzhi yi snying por gcig/ las kun snying po hUM gis byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// chos sku dngos med rtsol bral hUM// rtogs pas
399b4(ta): 'khor ba thams cad zhi// zhi ba'i 'phrin las snying por gcig/ snying po 'od gsal longs spyod sku// yon tan ye shes sku lnga rgyas// rgyas pa'i 'phrin las snying po
399b5(ta): gcig/ snying po 'gag med thogs med hUM// 'gyu ba rlung chan thogs chags med// yul snang tshogs kun sgrol bar sbyor// drag po'i 'phrin las dpa' bo gcig/
399b6(ta): 'gyus dran 'dzin chags zhi dbang rgyas// drag po zang thal dpa' bo gcig/ bya ba'i las grub ye shes gcig/ 'phrin las chen po'i snying po gcig/ ces
399b7(ta): gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las kyi le'u ste brgyad ba'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/
400a1(ta): nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// mchod pa'i snying po gcig po ni// 'dres shing dbyer med gnyis su med// snying po 'gro kun sangs rgyas la// ti
400a2(ta): dang mar bzhin dbye ru med// gzhi gcig snying po'i mchod pa gcig/ gzhi dang ras twa sa gnyis su med// 'khrul pa las kyi mchod pa gcig/ snying po 'gyus dran 'dzin
400a3(ta): chags dngas// 'khrul pa rang ldog mchod pa gcig/ rtsa rlung thig le rang 'byung hUM// gsal stong 'gag med mchod pa gcig/ skra gsung thugs dang yon tan las//
400a4(ta): snying po ye shes mchod pa gcig/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro hU~M// snying po chos med bla na med// bla ma slob dpon mchod pa gcig/ snying po yi dam sku lnga gsal// yi//
400a5(ta): dam rang 'byung mchod pa gcig/ snying po rang 'byung 'gyu ba 'gro// snying po'i mkha' la 'gyu ba 'gro// gnyis su med pa mchod pa gcig/ chos min snying po'i glong du gcig
400a6(ta): 'khor 'das kun rdzob don dam gcig/ 'di ni mchod pa chen po gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste/
400a7(ta): dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor snying po dpa' bo gcig/ bla med snying po chos min la//
400b1(ta): blo dngos rnal ma snying po 'byor// bla med rnal 'byor chos sku gcig/ snying po ye shes rnal ma 'byor// rang 'byung longs sku rnal 'byor gcig/ 'gyu ba ya med rnal ma
400b2(ta): 'byor// 'gag med sprul sku rnal 'byor gcig/ snang ba sna tshogs rnal ma 'byor// srog dang snying po rnal 'byor gcig/ rgyu la gnyis med 'bras bu gcig/
400b3(ta): snying po'i don la 'byor na 'byung // chos med chos sku rnal ma 'byor// snying po hU~M gi rnal 'byor yin// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// du ma rang 'byung gdam ngag yin//
400b4(ta): du ma ro gcig ma rtogs na// rnal ma'i don la 'byor mi srid// ming gi rnal 'byor grangs med de// don gyi rnal 'byor shin tu dka'// chos min glong du chos can sbyor//
400b5(ta): don dam glong du kun rdzob sbyor// gcig med glong du du ma sbyor// ming med gleng du tshig tshogs sbyor// sku med glong du snang gzugs sbyor// rgyu med rkyen med snying pa
400b6(ta): gsal/ 'khor 'das gnyis med ye shes sbyor// snying po rang 'byung rnal 'byor gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud
400b7(ta): las rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// snying po chos min sngags gcig ni//
401a1(ta): sngon du gyur pas gsang sngags don// snying po rang 'byung rang chas gsang // sngags pa'i don de gsang bas na// gsang sngags zhes par nga 'chad do// /
401a2(ta): snying po kun khyab chad pa med// 'das dang ma byon da ltar med// 'gro drug 'khrul pa rigs gcig ste// rig sngags zhes par nga 'chad do// snying po 'khor 'das ya ma chad//
401a3(ta): dper na gser dang gzugs brnyan 'dra// bde gshegs snying po 'gro kun khyab// gzungs sngags zhes par nga yis bshad// snying po don gyi sngags gcig yin// gsang sngags
401a4(ta): don gyi ngo bo ni// shes rab snying rje gnyis su med// rig sngags dag gi ngo bo ni// shes rab ye shes gnyis su med// gzungs sngags dag gi ngo bo ni// shes rab ting
401a5(ta): 'dzin gnyis su med// snying po don du sngags gsum gcig/ shes skyob phyir na sngags zhes bya// snying po rang 'byung sngags la ni// gzhi nas bag chags sel ba dang /
401a6(ta): ma rig rtog pa sel ba dang // 'phrul 'byung nyon mongs sel bar gcig/ rang 'byung snying po sngags gcig yin// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad
401a7(ta): gcig pa'i rgyud las// snying po don gyi sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod//
401b1(ta): snying po rin chen phyag rgya ni// snying po dus gsum 'gyur ba med// phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo gcig/ snying po chos las 'das pa med// phyag rgya chen po'i nges tshig gcig/ phyag
401b2(ta): rgya bzhi dang rtsa lnga hUM// chos dang bral ba'i snying po hUM// chos sku phyag rgya chen po gcig/ rang 'byung rang gdangs ye shes lnga// dam tshig longs sku'i phyag rgya gcig/ rang
401b3(ta): 'byung rang sprul 'gag pa med// sbrul sku chos kyi phyag rgya gcig/ snying po gcig 'byung rang 'gyu snang // sna tshogs las kun de yis byed// ma rig ye shes 'khor 'das
401b4(ta): las/ snying po las kyi phyag rgya gcig/ snying po phyag rgya kun gyi gzhi// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// snying po'i dpe ni nam mkha' bzhin// phyag rgya'i dpe ni rgyal
401b5(ta): ba'i bka'// rgyas btab de las 'da' mi srid// gsang sngags snying po ye shes yin// 'gag med shes pa shes rab yin// snying po chos med 'gyur med kyang // thugs
401b6(ta): rje phyag rgya 'gag med gcig/ 'gyu ba rlung gi ye shes na// ma rig nyon mongs chags sdung chags// chos med rgya las ma 'das so// 'gyu ba rlung gis gti mug na// rang reg
401b7(ta): ye shes rang grol phyag/ snying po chos can rgyal 'brums// de bas chos can chos nyid gcig/ gcig la las su rung bar gyis// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po
402a1(ta): tshe thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig/
402a2(ta): rdo rje drag mo khyad// snying po don gyi gsang rgyud ni// don gyi rgyud dang tshig gi rgyud// snying po rang 'byung glong na gcig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// bde bar gshegs pa'i
402a3(ta): thugs rgyud de// khams gsum snying po 'gro drug khyab// don rgyud chen po khyad par med// snying po rang 'byung gsung tshig bzhi// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrog/ sangs rgyas
402a4(ta): kun gyi gsung yang yin// sems can kun gyi skad du hUM// tshig rgyud snying po khyad par med// sangs rgyas sems can 'brel ba hUM// hUM gi gling du chos kun rdzogs//
402a5(ta): rdzogs pa'i glong na kun ka chang // snying pi gling du chos kun 'khrul// rang 'byung hUM la phun sum tshogs// lha sgom spyod pa dbang la sogs// snying po rgyud kyi lnga tshad gcig
402a6(ta): chos sku longs sku sprul skur brgyud// rdo rje 'chang gsum rgyun ma chad// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// 'khor 'das/
402a7(ta): gnyis po rgyun ma chad// rgyud chen snying po kun gzhi gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi le'u ste bcu gsum
402b1(ta): pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// spyi lung snying po rang 'byung ba rten// bla med snying po'i spyi gzhi 'di// lung chen kun
402b2(ta): gyi lung dang gcig/ lung ni zin sla khyer bar bde// rang 'byung snying po spyi chos hU~M// gang gi sgo nas 'jug spyod kyang // spyi tshes 'di la bstan te spyod// lung ni yid ches tshig
402b3(ta): yin te/ tshig sgo thams cad hUM las byung // nges par smra ba brdzun gyi tshig/ gcig las thams cad smra ba hUM// smra bar mi byed rgyu med phyir// gang snang 'khrul pa yin pas
402b4(ta): cho ga/ ming med yul dang bral bas chog/ ming med yul dang bral bas na// nyes zad lung du de zad dang // don gyi lung dang tshig gi lung // don gyi lung ni snying po'i gzhi//
402b5(ta): mi 'gyur chos min snying po hUM// tshig gi lung la bsam mi khyab// drang don nges don mdo rgyud sogs// theg pa phyi nang ston pa'i bka'// zhal nas gsungs pa dam pa'i
402b6(ta): chos/ rang 'byung snying po bkyer bar bde// rang 'byung dpa' bo kun nas 'brel// zin pa slal bkyer ba bde lung // rgyal po'i bka' dang snod pa shad lung // mtshon pa
402b7(ta): dpe rung nges ngar gyis// don mtshon yid ches lung zhes bya// bde gshegs dgongs pa'i thugs rje nas// 'gro drug sdug bsngal nyon mongs kun// las med rnam smin cir yang
403a1(ta): snang // snying po don cig 'gyur ba med// rgyal dang ra ro bag med kyang // snying po rang bzhin 'gyur ba med// dper na gser dang gzugs brnyan 'dra//
403a2(ta): snying po lung gcig gang yang yin// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ lung gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
403a3(ta): da nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po don gyi man ngag ni// lo rgyus rtsa ba tshig don dang // yo ga dgos ched lnga po gcig/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang /
403a4(ta): po'i bar// rigs 'dzin bla ma mdzub tshugs bstan// lo rgyus yid ches snying po gcig/ rtsa ba snying po rang 'byung bas// chos can chos nyid 'khor 'das dang // phyi ba
403a5(ta): nang pa theg pa'i sgo// snying po'i gzhi las gyes mdo gcig/ tshig don snying po byin rlabs dang // rdo rje 'chang gsum bshad lugs dang // mtshon byed tshig gi snying po
403a6(ta): bstan/ rang 'byung snying po'i gdam ngag gcig/ yi ge don gyi snying po bstan// rang theg pa la shan dbye ba// snying po 'di ru chos nyid gcig/ rtsa ba'i snying po rang 'byung
403a7(ta): gcig/ dgos chen kun gyi spyi gzhi 'di// 'gro drug theg pa kha 'thor nas// bsdu ba'i don du rang 'byung hUM// 'khrul pa bzlog pas snying po gcig/ don gyi snying po spyi gzhi
403b1(ta): 'di/ khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// nyag gcig snying po bstan pa yin// rdo rje 'chang ba gsum mdzod 'di// tshig gis don la sbyar ba yis// zhal nas gsungs pa'i/
403b2(ta): rgyud lung kun// ma nor don la khrigs su btab// gsal 'debs yi ge ris su bkod// tshig don gsal bar byed pa yin// tshigs chung don che snying po 'di// gang
403b3(ta): dang ci yang las rung bas// nges tshig gtan tshigs snying po hUM// bla ma slob bum bu 'dra// spyir na rgyud lung gdam ngag gsum// rje dang blon po 'brangs gsum 'dra//
403b4(ta): bla ma'i brgyud pa bar ma chad// de yi lung thob bka' bzhin bsgrub// bum pa'i chu bzhin gdam ngag thob// de la bstan pa yang thob bo// de yi snying po de bas na// snying
403b5(ta): bo don gyi man ngag gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rini po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ man ngag gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de
403b6(ta): nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyed// snying po don gyi lta ba ni// ci yang yin no gang yang rung // phyogs dang bral bas nam mkha' 'dra// snying po rang
403b7(ta): 'byung blo yangs pas// dgag sgrub med pa'i chos ming yin// yul med ming med gcig kyang med// rang 'byung rang snang rtsol sgrub med// gsal med stong med chos las
404a1(ta): 'das// snying po hUM gi lta ba gcig/ thig le nyag gcig snying po dang // gang snang grogs su snang bar bya// rin chen 'phrul gyi snying po bsgom/
404a2(ta): ma yangs gnang du hUM dang 'grogs// phyi rlung sdoms pa nang rlung zung // lus srong yan lag snying kha mkhal// dkar dmar rlung sdoms tshangs bug sdoms// mkha' la 'bru tshugs
404a3(ta): btsan thabs gnad// rdo rje pad+ma rtsa kha nas// dkar dmar ra tsa 'du ti tsa// mdud pa lnga na sgo thebs lnga// phyed par byed na 'dris par gyis// gyen dang thur dang thad ka gsum//
404a4(ta): lta stangs zhi khro sems dpa'i gnad// mtshad gzhu dang theg pa ste// yang g.yangs dang bcas par tshud// 'grus dran 'dzin chags yangs pa med// gang snang gang 'gyus
404a5(ta): lam slong zhing // gnyid dang ra ro g.yeng ba kun// khyad par med na bsgom pa gcig/ rang rang nyams myong nga rgyal gnod// dge sdig 'khrul chos lam du slong // bar med 'phro/
404a6(ta): med 'bralas med// tshogs drug 'dod pa'i ri mo ltar// chags sdang dgra gnyen ngos mi 'dzin// skyes bu nad kyis gzir ba 'dra// bu bzhin ma yi sems las bzhin//
404a7(ta): yengs pa med na spyod pa gcig/ snying po rgyun chags spyod pa gcig/ ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ lha sgom spyod pa'i le'u
404b1(ta): ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po chos min grub mtha' gcig/ sku gsum chos sku'i ngang du/
404b2(ta): gcig/ 'byung lnga nam mkha'i ngang du gcig/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa gcig/ dper na rgya mtshor chu bran 'dra// gdul bya'i don du skur bstan pa// rgya mtshor
404b3(ta): gza' skar shar ba 'dra// rdo rje 'chang gsum chos min sku// snying po chos min chos kyi sku// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'bras bu gcig/ yul snang yangs pas ye shes
404b4(ta): rgyas// rang rig ye shes chos kyi sku// dang po'i rdo rje 'chang du grags// rig pa'i chos med chos kyi sku// mdzad pa med pa'i byin rlabs ni// rtsol ba med par sku nyid
404b5(ta): 'byung / tathig le chos min longs spyod sku// so so rigs kyi 'bras bur ldan// sku lnga ye shes sgyu mar snang // 'od gsal rigs lnga mtshon rdzogs sku// rdo rje 'chang/
404b6(ta): ba bar ma yin// don gnyis gzigs kyang shes bya'i 'phrang // 'od zer dpag med yum dang sras// ma skyed yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor gcig/ sna tshogs chos min
404b7(ta): sprul pa'i sku// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bur snang // rang 'byung rang snang ye shes sku// sna tshogs sprul pas sna tshogs 'dul// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma ste// mdzad pa'i las rnams
405a1(ta): 'gro don byed// gang la cis 'dul sprul pa med// sna tshogs theg pa blo dang sbyor// snying po rang 'byung dpal ba hUM// snying po til dang mar bzhin du//
405a2(ta): yongs la khyab pa'i sgra sgrog ste// rtsa rlung ye shes rang 'byung ston// snying po grub pa'i mtha' gcig yin// zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad
405a3(ta): gcig pa'i rgyud las/ grub mtha'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// snying po chos min/
405a4(ta): gru gsum las// thugs rje las 'byung bstan pa ni// dper na ston ka'i nyi ma sprin dang chas// byin gyis brlabs kyis 'byung ba yin// lus dang yan lag nying lag
405a5(ta): / ma dang dbang po rnam m+b+ha dra// rnyeng pa tshas smin la // gams pa med po'i myangangan 'das// mdzad pa med pa'i byinan pas 'byung // mongs
405a6(ta): 'od dang sprin dang yang // sprin 'das 'od gsal yan lag lnga// thig le chos min rdo rje 'chang // sprul sku char zer nying lag 'dra// gang la gang mos cis 'dul bzhin//
405a7(ta): 'phrin las 'gro don sna tshogs mdzad// theg rnams chos sgo rdo rje 'chang // lus ngag yid gsum dge bcu 'dzud// yi ge 'dri klog la sogs te// rgyud dang ye shes tshog
405b1(ta): la bskul// dbang po rab 'bring tha mal// rang rang blo dang sbyar te 'khrid// bla med snying po yang gsang 'di// de la gdung bzhi bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// dam tshig rnam gsum sku
405b2(ta): gsung thugs// yan lag bcu gnyis gsang sngags don// 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'gro ba'i don// mchod pa'i bye brag phyi nang gsum// sgrub pa'i khyad par theg pa'i khyad//
405b3(ta): snying po rnam gsum bsdus rgyas dang // sku gsum grub pa'i 'bras bu dang // lnga ldan gsum ldan gcig ngo sprod// srog dang snying po mthar thug yin// sprul pa'i 'khor
405b4(ta): lo sna tshogs 'chang // sku gsum 'gro don mtha' la skyel// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ thugs rje dge bcu
405b5(ta): rang gzhung gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje drag mo dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang sems dpa' bzhis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di
405b6(ta): skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang // 'og min 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// snying po dpa' bo tshig sgrub dang // mkha' 'gro ma mo rgyud mtshan dang // bstan 'char
405b7(ta): dus dang gtad pa gsungs// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyed// dpa' bo tshig sgrub nga yis bstan// ma khal gcig dang
406a1(ta): bum pa gcig/ gtor ma gcig dang rak+ta gcig/ bdud rtsi gcig dang mar me gcig/ shes rab can gyis sgrub pa gyis// bkra shis dben pa'i
406a2(ta): sa phyogs su// dang po bla ma mnyes byas la// ma Dal khrag gis chag chag gdab// zlum po sgo bzhi pho brang cig/ rang 'byung hUM bri mtshon lngas bskor// rdo rje 'chang gi
406a3(ta): dkyil 'khor chag/ bum pa mthing ka 'o ka dang // sman dang dri dang rin po che// snying po 'bru dang phan pa cig/ kha rgyan rtsa gcig lo ma yin// lnga sgril gzungs thag cig
406a4(ta): btags te// gtsang ma ras kyis mgul bcings la// ma Dal pho brang dbus su bzhag/ mtshan ldan ya rabs thod pa ru// 'bru bshos sha che na gtor ma cig/ khrag
406a5(ta): che na me tog mthing kas brgyan// dkyil 'khor de yi g.yas su bzhag/ bud med mtshan ldan thod pa ru// na chung rdol pa'i mngal khrag dang // skyes pa dar ma'i khrag
406a6(ta): dang ni/ ta lce spyang khrag ni rab yin te// khrag sna rnyed tshad tha ma'o// ma Da la de yi g.yon du bzhag/ thod pa rin chen bum pa ru// sum bris 'bru yau khu ba la// bdud
406a7(ta): rtsi sman mchog rtsal la ni// sgrub pa dag gi mdun stengs bzhag/ drag po lcags kyi skong bu ru/ pho mo dar ma'i zhun blugs la// ro ras dri med sdong bu gzhug/ stegs
406b1(ta): mtho bum pa'i rgyab tu bzhag/ tshogs dang mchod rdzas ldan pas bsgrub// thams cad 'dus pa kun gyi las// chos min snying po rang 'byung 'di// chos sku'i zhal gzigs long
406b2(ta): skur gsal// sprul skur lung ston 'byung bar nges// dpa' bo tshig sgrub de ltar sgrub// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/
406b3(ta): rang 'byung tshig sgrub kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod// pho sgrub mo sgrub khrag gis dbye//
406b4(ta): sngags ni rdo rje pho mo rang rang 'dzab// dpa' bo tshig 'dzab lnga po ltar bsgrub// mkha' 'gro'i gling rnam pa lnga mo ltar sgrub// phyi ltar dkyil 'khor brda ru bstan// nang ltar rtsa
406b5(ta): rlung thig le'i chos// gsang bar 'gyu ba tshig ded byang // rang 'byung lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// pho mo yab yum mtha' dag rdzogs// snying po 'gyur ba rang 'byung la//
406b6(ta): 'khor 'das ye shes nyon mongs 'byung // nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod// nam mkha' stong pa'i glong yangs la// 'byung ba bzhi po 'gro bar byed// kun gyi gzhi ma nam
406b7(ta): mkha' yin// don gyi snying po 'di la sbyor// spyi gzhi lus kyi khog pa la// yan lag dbang po rnam shes 'gro// kun gzhi ma mo rtsa dang rlung // snying po 'gag med rang la
407a1(ta): sbyor/ spyi gzhi snying po mkha' chen la// gzhi rlung 'gyu ba 'gag med 'gro// gang la thol med ma thog rung // yang dag la zla mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/
407a2(ta): 'byung ba ma mo mkha' 'gro yin// sa chu me rlung ma bran 'da'// spyi gzhi mkha' la kun gzhi mo// 'byung ba lnga ni ma mo yin// srid pa'i rgyal mo ma mo che// ma mo 'bum sde
407a3(ta): grangs med kyang // sman mo lnga bcu brgyad du 'dus// de yang mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis// de las dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// rje mo bcu bzhi yum chen drug/ mkha' 'gro/
407a4(ta): sde bzhi srid pa'i rgyal// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal mthong na// snang srid ma mo thams cad gzigs// phyi ltar ri rab gling bzhi mtshon// nang du rtsa rlung thig le 'od// sman
407a5(ta): mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyang // 'khor lo rtsa mdud rnam lnga la// rtsa 'dab brgyad brgyad steng 'og gnyis// mtha' gnyis med pas lnga bcu brgyad// lus kyi 'khor lo spyi bo
407a6(ta): mkha'// gyes pa rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis rlung // mkha' 'gro ma yi cha 'dzin no// sgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// gyes pa rtsi rlung thig
407a7(ta): le zhugs// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// ma dang dza dang b+h+yo ru gnas// mgrin pa longs spyod thabs zhes bzhag/ bcu bzhi rtsa dang ma bran hUM// ye nas snying po kun skyed
407b1(ta): byed/ rje mo bcu bzhi'i tshul du gnas// rnam shes tshogs drug rtsi tshul du// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa hUM las ma// yab la yum ni dgyes byed 'dra// dbyings kyi yum drug
407b2(ta): tshul du gnas// snying nas rtsa bzhi yig 'bru bzhi// dngas ma 'od kyi gdangs su gnas// thig le hUM las snying po ma// rlung gzhi 'od dang chas nas 'gro// snying po rang
407b3(ta): 'byung hU~M las srid// srid pa'i rgyal mo kun 'dul ma// spyi gzhi snying po hUM gi gzhi// sna tshogs chos rnams srid pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje snying po rin po
407b4(ta): che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag mo khyod/
407b5(ta): sde brgyad lha srin snying po'i rtsal// 'byung ba 'byung phran nam mkha'i glong // chos sku snying po kun gzhi la// longs sku rang 'byung 'gag med gdangs// sprul sku rang snang sna
407b6(ta): tshogs ston// thub drug srid pa'i bon chos sman// mo bzo lha srin drug tu sprul// gdul bya re re mngon rtags bstan// skul 'debs lha srin sde brgyad ni// gling bzhi
407b7(ta): ri rab rgya mtsho kun// phyi sten rang rang 'thun chos sten// brda ru phyi rabs rjes 'jug la// yang dag snying po yin phyir bstan// gdul bya phyi ltar dgye ba yin// lus dang
408a1(ta): rnam shes don snying dang // yan lag rtsa rlung nying lag dang // nang rten rang rang chos mthun yin// ris drug thub drug lus la gnas// spyi bo rtsa
408a2(ta): gyis nye dbang lha// sum cu rtsa gnyis rgya spyi gtsug/ lha dang thub pa bsam pa ste// lus kyi ri rab rtse dang mthun// mgrin pa rtsod pa'i sgra ldan na// lha min thag bzangs
408a3(ta): bcas pa yin// snying min thag bzangs bcas pa yin// snying gi ri rab rtse bzhi gling // nga rgyal dge sdig shAkya mi// lte ba srid pa rgya mtsho na// sna tshogs byol song
408a4(ta): seng ge rta// gsang ba 'dod chags sgrib pa'i yul// 'di dag kha 'a bar chos mthun yod// yan lag dbang po smon shes la// zhe sdang rang sbyor rang sreg yul// 'dod
408a5(ta): yon chags cig tsha grang dang // rang la rang gsod glang mgo srid// lha dang klu dang gshin rje rlung // gza' dang rgyal po bdud dang btsan// srin po gnod sbyin ma mo rnams//
408a6(ta): ming dang tha snyad don du hUM// spyi gzhi snying po rang 'byung ngo // mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid dang rnam shes dang // kun gzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyad dang //
408a7(ta): mtshan 'dzin rang gnas de brgyad do// sten pa lus kyi spyi gzhi la// don gnyis lnga dang rtsa rlung khrag/ sde brgyad dngos por yod pa ste// mkhal ma klu yi mkhar yin te//
408b1(ta): chu rtsa brgyad mtsho chen po'i gnas// 'tsher ba bdud kyi gnas yin te// lhag pa bdud rtsa nag po gnas// mchin pa btsan dang gshin rje'i mkhar// khrag mtsho srog pa rtsa
408b2(ta): dang 'brel// glo ba gnod sbyin ma mo'i 'khor// las rlung thugs dang 'brel ba'i rtsa// snying ni gza' dang rgyal ba'i mkhar// kun khyab rgyal po 'gyu ba'i rtsa// rgyal po
408b3(ta): dkar nag gnyis yin te// snying stod dkar mthing gnyis la gnas// snying rtse gza' yi rlung rtsar 'brel// lha dang khyab 'jug klu dang ma mo// dbang du bsdu ba shin tu gces/
408b4(ta): lha ni dbang phyug chen po ste// 'gyu ba dbang phyug dbang du gyis// dran pas dbang du 'dus pa yin// gza' ni tshangs pa khyab 'jug ste// yid dang 'gyu ba khyab cing 'jug
408b5(ta): rang 'byung snying po ngo shes tshangs// tshangs pa'i bu ga 'byongs na 'char// klu rgyal nor bu rin chen ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung // snying po nor bu rin chen 'dra//
408b6(ta): rang 'byung 'od kyis ngo shes na// 'dod pa'i don grub rin po che// rdo rje pad+ma 'byongs na phan// gzhi la snying po hUM yin pas// srid pa'i rgyal mo ma mo'i gtso// mkha' 'gro
408b7(ta): bzhi ni rtag tu 'khor// 'khor bzhi dbang du bsdu b.ragaces// chos nyid gzhi ma snying po mkha'// nam mkha'i glog bzhin 'gyu ba 'gro// nam mkha' shugs 'gro dran pa
409a1(ta): sogs/ 'dzin pa gzung 'dzin ting 'dzin gnas// chags pa rang 'dod nyams myong gnad// dran pa yang med spyod pa gnad// 'gyu ba rang
409a2(ta): 'byung lta stangs gnad// gnad bzhi shes pas lta sgom spyod// gzer bzhi thebs pas mkha' 'gro dbang // dbang bzhi thob pas 'phrang bzhi sol// 'phrang bzhi sol bas
409a3(ta): 'khor bzhi grol// 'khor bzhi grol bas bdud bzhi thul// bdud bzhi thul bas ye shes bzhi// ye shes rang 'byung chos kyi dbyings// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal ngo gzigs//
409a4(ta): dbang phyug chen po dbang du bsdus// tshangs pa chen po'i lung ston gnad// dga' bo 'jog po'i nor bu thob// ris drug g.yang sa de ru chod// 'da' can 'phra ra de ru
409a5(ta): bsgral/ 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi de ru choms// sde brgyad cho 'phrul de ru zad// srid pa'i bon la gyer sa med// dam pa'i chos la bshad sa med// 'tsho byed sman la
409a6(ta): bcos sa med// mthong byed mo la ltas med// so nam bzol byas med// sde brgyad 'dre yis gnod sa med// shes pa brgyad pos rtogs pa 'chang // bdag rig
409a7(ta): gzhan rig thams cad rig/ 'byung ba snying po chos las grol// ces gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ sde brgyad rang grol gyi
409b1(ta): le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje drag po khyod// nga yi gdams pa'i chos rgyud 'di// 'byung ba'i rgyal po nam
409b2(ta): mkha' 'dra// rgya chang phyogs su lhung ba med// rgya mtsho chen po'i dpe dang 'dra// zab pa gting thag chod pa med// za 'og ber khyim phub pa 'dra// gcig la ma 'dres kun
409b3(ta): ka gsal// med par sna tshogs ston par byed// nor bu rin chen 'chang ba 'dra// thams cad mi 'byung gang yang med// rin chen gser gyi gzugs dang 'dra// gzhi la
409b4(ta): 'gyur med sna tshogs gzugs// rin chen gling du phyin pa 'dra// bor du rung ba gang yang med// 'phrul gyi me long g.ya' dag 'dra// yod dang med pa snga phyi gsal// ga pur
409b5(ta): tsan dan dug dang 'dra// mkhas na sman te ma rig dug/ brda rtags sgra don rnam bzhi yis// chos nyid shig thog mdzub bzhag 'dra// gcig par bstan pa'i gdams ngag
409b6(ta): 'di ta zangs kyi sbubs su chu btsud 'dra// gshor gyi nang du rlung btsud 'dra// zigs pa bzhin du gcig stengs gcig/ bya brgya thal mo gcig gis 'phur// rol brgya
409b7(ta): shal ba gcig gis subs// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos nyid gcig/ gcig tu bstan gyis legs par rtogs// gcig par bstan pa'i gsang rgyud 'di// chos can thams
410a1(ta): cad chos nyid gcig/ gcig po 'khor 'das snying po gcig/ snying po khyab chos rgyud du zung // dpa' bo gcig pa rdo rje hUM// gcig po 'gyur myed
410a2(ta): thams cad 'joms// rdo rje gcig po'i rgyud du zung // gcig ni sna tshogs kun gyi gzhi// snying po kun 'byung rin po che// rin chen rang 'byung rgyud du zung // 'jug sgo theg
410a3(ta): ba bsam 'das kyang // snying po chos med chos nyid gcig/ thams cad hUM la bsdus pas na// 'thor ba bsdus pa'i rgyud du zung // sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa gcig/
410a4(ta): dgongs pa gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // de yi dgongs pa de la bstan// dgongs pa gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // de yi dgongs pa de la bstan// dgongs pa rgyad pa'i rgyud du zung //
410a5(ta): de yis lung blangs de dang ldan// lung blangs zab mo'i rgyud du zung // tshegs chung bas ni don gcig bstan// man ngag zab mo'i rgyud du zung // de la de bsten de yang thob//
410a6(ta): thob pa gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // gnas kyi dang po 'og min du// mkha' 'gro drag mo khyod kyis zhus// ma rgyud mo yi rgyud du zung // thams cad snying po ma la gcig/ thams
410a7(ta): cad gcig pa'i rgyud du zung // zhes gsungs so// snying po rdo rje rin po che thams cad gcig pa'i rgyud las/ dpe dang rgyud kyi don mtshan du bkrol ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// /
410b1(ta): / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma tshogs khyed// byin gyis brlabs pas rgyud 'di zung // phyi rabs rnal 'byor las can la/
410b2(ta): snying po don gyi tshigs rgyud 'di// pha rol phyin drug snying por bstan// snying po don shes rab shes mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin par smos// de yi don la yengs pa med//
410b3(ta): bsam gtan pha rol phyin par smos// rnal 'byor snying po'i tshul dang ldan// tshul khrims pha rol phyin par smos// de rtogs bde sdug gang yang bzod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin
410b4(ta): par smos// snying po zab mo de sbyin pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par smos// don la gzhan don do la brtson// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin par smos// pha rol phyin pa'i don
410b5(ta): bsdus pas// yi ge gcig pa'i mdo gsum bstan// de ltar 'di ltar gcig pa'i sgor// thams cad rig pa'i don brgyud 'di// rdo rje drag mo khyod la gtad// khyod kyang
410b6(ta): mkha' 'gro rigs la gtod// rgyal po'i sras mo las rung gyis// der gtad nga yi tshad dang 'phrad// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma des// las 'phro gcig pa'i mkha' 'gro gcig/
