444b3(ta): sel med rang byung bas// de ni dam tshig rtsa ba yin// blon pos de la zhon pa ni// rang byung ye shes rang gis bsrungs// seng ge rtsal gsum rdzogs pa ni// chos sku
444b4(ta): rang snang rdo rje 'dra// de las 'das ni 'tshig par 'gyur// longs sku rang snang pad+ma 'dra// de las 'das ni 'ching bar 'gyur// sprul sku rang snang rin chen 'dra// de las
444b5(ta): 'das na brlag par 'gyur// gom pa gcig gis sa gcad pa// chos sku rtsod bral dam tshig yin// skad cig don sar sleb pa ni// ma bsrungs mi 'da'i dam tshig thub cing
444b6(ta): bsrung du grol// dam tshig shel gyi 'phreng ba 'di// thams cad dri med zang thal la// nyams dang bskang ba bya mi dgos// ci ste rang la mi 'da' bas// rgyal po rang rtags
444b7(ta): dam tshig min// rin chen shel gyi 'phreng ba yin// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig shel 'bring zla batho nal kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig shal 'bring gi 'i rjehU~M/
445a1(ta): gsum pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i 'phreng bas// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po la// lta bzod rgal gsung du gsol//
445a2(ta): ces zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal dang // nang gi lta ba thod rgal dang // sbas pa bla na med
445a3(ta): pa'o// de ni nga yis bstan par bya// legs par nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal ni// snang ba rang grol ngo bo'i sku// rgyu rkyen med pas
445a4(ta): mkha' ltar gsal// rang byung chos sku kho na lo// lta ba stong nyid thod rgal bas// 'od gsal chos nyid don gyis 'phags// gnyen po med pas rang byung sku// nam
445a5(ta): mkha' gdangs dang chas pa ltar// rang byung chos sku 'od las grol// rang snang thig les khyab pas na// phyi yi lta ba thod rgal yin// 'byung ba skyes pa bud med sogs//
445a6(ta): rgya mtsho dar dang rlabs sna bzhin// thig le dag las 'das pa ni// phra rab rdul yang mi rnyed do// lta ba thod rgal rang byung shar// stod kyis byung bas rtse mor phyin//
445a7(ta): zla brtsegs pas grib ma med// 'og ma'i grub mtha' yas rgal bas// seng ge dkar mos 'og rta byed// theg dgu'i rtse mor phyin pa yin// zhes gsungs so//
445b1(ta): lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ phyi lta ba thod rgal gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsol pa/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po lagra//
445b2(ta): nang gi lta ba thod rgal ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// me long g.ya' dang bral ba la// ji ltar gnas pa'i gzugs snang ngo //
445b3(ta): tshogs drug rang snang gsal ba 'di// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma skyed pas// lha la sogs pa'i rigs lnga kun// rang snang thabs su grol tsam na// sku gsum brtsegs pa'i rtse
445b4(ta): mor phyin// spyan snga rang sa'i rgyalas grol// ye shes mig gcig rtse mo sleb// mthong bya yul da rang grol bas// sangs rgyas sdud pa rin po che// dbang bskur brtsegs pa
445b5(ta): dbang gi mchog/ dbang mchog rang byung thig ler brdal// 'byung ba lnga dang rigs lnga 'od// dug lnga la sogs snang ba kun// 'khrugs pa'i dus na chu nyid la// chu nyid 'khyas
445b6(ta): ba'i ngo bor snang // rang snang chu yi thod rgal yin// 'byung ba lnga sogs gang snang ba// rang snang thig ler rang byung yin// rang byung ston pas thod rgal yin// spyan gsum
445b7(ta): rnam dag rgal ba de// ye shes mig gcig thod nal yin// dug gi rgyal po ngo bo yis// dug nad can la btang gyur na// dug gi nad las grol bar 'gyur// ji ltar
446a1(ta): tshogs drug rang sar bzhag/ 'khor ba'i nad las grol bar 'gyur// ma bcings pa ni chos min sku// ma bslad pas na ye shes te// ma sgrubs
446a2(ta): pas na 'bras bu'o// lta ba gol bas thod rgal min// rang sa ma shes man ngag min// 'dus byas 'bras bu gnas skabs chos// ma byas rang sar ma shes na// lta
446a3(ta): bzod rgal dam tshig nyams// zhes gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ nang lta ba'i thod rgal gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bcom ldan kun
446a4(ta): tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro rnams la bka' stsal pa// smras pa'i lta ba 'di lta ste// btsun mo bde ba skyong ma la// mtshan mo skyes pa brgyad khri dang / bzhi stong
446a5(ta): ngag gis chags pa spyad// slar la 'dod pa skyes nas su// ji tsam spyad kyang mtshim nas// slar la bde ba tshol du phyin// yul ni glang chen rin chen gling // gser gyi
446a6(ta): nyi ma bya ba yod// de mtshan mos stong gsum sreg/ spun du su byung rang bar sbyor// de dang mo gnyis phrad pa las// pho mtshan mthong bas yid 'byung ngo // de bde
446a7(ta): don ni 'di lta ste// btsun mo kun gzhi sbyangs ma la// skyes pa nyon mongs brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong las gyur pa yi// chags pa 'khor ba'i snang ba'o// slar 'dod
446b1(ta): skyes pa 'gro ba drug/ ji tsam 'khor kyang mi grol te// skye shi zo zhing rgyud nas tshol// chos nyid klong chen sku gsum gnas// 'gyur med ye shes gser lta bu// phyi nang
446b2(ta): med pas kun tu khyab// bla mas don bstan rang la shar// rang shar ye shes ngo shes pas// rang sgo mthong bas zhe 'dod med// tshogs drug rol pa rang grol las// ye
446b3(ta): shes thig le rgyun chad med// chags sdang 'dod yon 'ung chub kun// rtse gcig dgongs pa rang sar sleb// thig le brtsegs pa'i rtse mo na// rang byung ye shes chos min
446b4(ta): la/ lta ba thod rgal rdo rje brtsegs// chags sdang rang byung rang grol bas// nyams myong drod rtags rang sar grol// gal te gser 'dod rnyed pa la// gser 'dod slang
446b5(ta): pa dag la rten// me nyid 'dod pas me dang phrad pa na// du ba'i rnam pa med stong mi 'gyur// rang grol thod rgod rang shar bas// lta rtogs stong pa nyid la rag ma lus// zhes
446b6(ta): gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ gsang lta'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la
446b7(ta): bka' stsal pa// bla med thod rgal bstan gyis nyon// ces gsungs so// de la ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// lta ba stong
447a1(ta): pa'i yul las grol// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba kun gyi mes po yin// rang byung thig le rang shar bas// lta ba kun gyi mes po
447a2(ta): yin// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// snang srid kun gyi mes po yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pas// rgyal ba yab yum mes po yin// sems
447a3(ta): dang yid dang rnam shes rnams// de med rnam rtog ma grub pas// sems canames po yin// rtog pa grol ba'i yul med pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin//
447a4(ta): rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung bas// 'dus ma byas kyi mes po yin// snang srid 'khor 'das pa'i gdams// snang srid kun gyi mes po yin// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// su//
447a5(ta): yang gang zhig yod ma yin// nga ni kun gyi spyi mes yin// lta ba thod rgal yang mes yin// theg pa mtho dman thod rgal grub mtha'i rgyal po yin// 'bras bu thod rgal yul
447a6(ta): med rang grol yin// spyod pa thod rgal snang srid gzhi bzhengs yin// bsam gtan thod rgal bying rgod rtsal gcod yin// lam rnams thod rgal rang snang rnam dag yin//
447a7(ta): zhes gsungs so// lta bzod rgal gyi rgyud las/ bla med thod rgal gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// ston pa kun tu
447b1(ta): bzang po lags// spyod pa thod rgal gsung bar zhu// zhes zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng // spyod pa thod rgal
447b2(ta): bstan pa na// ma byas spyod pa rang byung thod rgal ni// phyi nang 'od la spyod shes na// longs sku rang gdangs phyogs med spyod// spyod pa rang shugs la shar// ma bkag rang
447b3(ta): byung spyod pa thod rgal yin// rang snang lus skye med spyod shes na// chos sku rang phyogs med spyod// spyod mkhan rang snang spyod yum grol// ma bsgrubs rang shar spyod pa thod
447b4(ta): rgal yin// gsang snang 'gyu ba yid dag la// rang shar spyod pa sprul sku khong nas shar// spyad rgyu rang gdangs 'od gsal phyogs ris med// spyod pa thod rgal cir snang sprul
447b5(ta): pa'i sku/ thams cad spyod par shar bas 'khrul pa'i ming mo thogs// spyod pa thod rgal thabs la re mi ltos// rang grol thabs la mi brten pas// spyod pa thod rgal zhes su
447b6(ta): bshad// ces gsungs so// lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud las/ spyod pa thabs las ma byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro
447b7(ta): mas/ sgom pa thod rgal gsung du gsol// ces zhus pas/ kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng // sgom pa thod rgal
448a1(ta): bstan pa ni// sgom nyams las thod rgal bas// rang byung ye shes kun tu brdal// sgom mkhan 'gyu bar rang gdangs pas// rang rig ye shes
448a2(ta): khong nas shar// sgom rgyu'i gdams ngag thod rgal bas// lhag mthong rang byung khong nas shar// sgom pa'i yul med thod rgal bas// gnyis med ye shes khong nas 'bar//
448a3(ta): sgom pa'i 'bras bu thod rgal bas// thig le nyag gcig khong nas 'bar// nyams myong thod rgal bying rmugs med// ye shes thod rgal snang srid thig le 'bar// ces gsudra//
448a4(ta): so/ lta ba thong rgal gyi rgyud las/ sgom pa thod rgal gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // 'bras bu thod rgal bstan pa ni// 'bras bu thod rgal rnams spyod
448a5(ta): dus las grol// re dogs thod rgal rang snang thig ler 'bar// snang srid thod rgal bar do'i yul las grol// 'khor 'das thod rgal thig le rangs zin// bar mtshams thod
448a6(ta): rgal thig le gcig bzhag sku// thob mkhan thod rgal yul med rang la shar// thob rgyu thod rgal ye nas rang sar grol// thob bya thod rgal snang srid thig ler brdal// phyi nang
448a7(ta): med pas nyag gcig yin// zhes gsungs so// lta bzod rgal gyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu'i rang sgo'i le'u ste bcu po'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro
448b1(ta): mas bskor ba du ma byas nas/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal dri ma med pa lta ba thod rgal bstan pas/ bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo // sdud pa po 'jam/
448b2(ta): dpal dri ma med pa/ zhu ba po mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'phreng bas zhus pa/ lta ba thod rgal gyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya rgya rgya/ gsang ngo //
448b3(ta): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa lo kir ti shwa ra sa ma ti e ka tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
448b4(ta): ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
448b5(ta): po la spyan ras gzigs seng gi rnam par rtse ba dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rab tu bskor/ rang byung byin rlabs ston pa'i dus// byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes shar ba'i
448b6(ta): tshebastan pa rang snang shugs tshod la// ting 'dzin rtse gcig brgyud pa'o// de nas mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng ba yis// chos nyid brdal ba'i pho brang du//
448b7(ta): bcom ldan kun tu bzang po la// lta ba rkyen thub ji ltar lags// bsam gtan rkyen thub ji ltar lags// spyod pa rkyen thub ji ltar lags// gnyid log rkyen thub ji ltar
449a1(ta): lags// rmi lam rkyen thub ji ltar lags// bar do rkyen thub ji ltar lags// ye shes rkyen thub ji ltar lags// nges shes rkyen thub ji ltar mag/
449a2(ta): lags/ byug+sa gas sbyin thugs gas/ 'dzum n+dan shAg+sa/ rnaMs rnam pa/ na pa
449a3(ta): mkha' 'gro nyi ma'i 'phreng // nga yis khyod la bstan par bya// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ zhus pa dang lan gnang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//
449a4(ta): kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal po// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// b+ha ba rkyen thub mi thub gnyis// rkyen thub 'di ltar shes par gyis// rang snang
449a5(ta): thig le'i glong chen la// rgyu med pa la rkyen med pas// phyi nang med par lta ba'i gdengs// zang thal shar bas gnyen po med// skye med rdo rje rang snang ba// gnyen
449a6(ta): bopos choms pa'i skabs med pas// lta ba klong chen rtsol sgrub grol// ye grol thig le rang la shar// ma byas rang sgro lta ba'i mchog/ skye med rnam dga'ub chub klong //
449a7(ta): phyi nang med pas man shel 'dra// dpe zla med pas nam mkha' 'dra// rgyu rkyen med pas nyi ma 'dra// thams cad rdzogs pas nor bu 'dra// lta ba lkog gyur stong nyid
449b1(ta): mkhan// da lta sbyangs na phyi dus 'debs// sangs rgyas phyi dus mkhan po de// lta ba rkyen khar shor ba yin// rkyen thub rkyen nyid las grol ba// gnyis med lta ba rang
449b2(ta): la snang / tade ni lta ba rkyen thub yin// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ lta ba rkyen med ngo sprod kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
449b3(ta): / bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la// bsam gtan rkyen thub bstan pa ni// bsam gtan chen po thun gcig po// bsam gtan
449b4(ta): rang sgo bying rmugs sel// rang byung nyams las grol ba yi// rtse gcig ye shes nyams las grol// nyams myong bag chags phrag dog chung // phra mo'i rtog pa rang sar/
449b5(ta): dag/ yengs sa med pa rig pa khri gnad// yengs su me pa rtse gcig 'ching // bying rmugs rgod dang khro ba kun// kun kyang grogs su shes gyur na// sgom pa rkyen thub rtse
449b6(ta): gcig yin// bying rmugs rgod dang 'phro ba rnams// dgug pa gsang ba bya mi dgoso// ye shes rang shar bying rgod kyang // rang grol 'ub chub rtse mor phyin// thun tshad
449b7(ta): gzung du gcig por 'dus// nyag gcig rtog sgom nyams las 'das// ye shes sgom pa ma yin te// ye shes sgom du blo snang med// blo snang sgoms pas rkyen mi thug/
450a1(ta): ngo bo blo snang rang sgo de// ye shes rang shar ting 'dzin rkyen thub yin// zhes gsungs so// rtse gcig rang sgo'i le'u las/ mtha' grol rkyen thub
450a2(ta): kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la// spyod pa rkyen thub bstan pa ni// rang byung
450a3(ta): shugs byung spyod pa ni// snang srid thug phrad shes pa ni// shes rab thabs kyi spyod pa ste// byas spyod ma yin rang shar la// bzang rtog ngan rtog tshogs su spyod//
450a4(ta): sgyispyod med ring shir 'ung chub dang // mnyam par shes pas yul med de// spyod po slong ldan rkye na mi b+hU // dug sngar 'bar bde bar spyod// rang byung grogs su shar ba
450a5(ta): rkyen rnams thub// snang ba 'od gsal phyi yi rkyen thub yin// tshogs drug rang dag nang gi rkyen thub yin// 'gyu ba dang sa sangs gsang ba'i rkyen thub yin// rol pa rang
450a6(ta): grol ngo bo'i rkyen thub yin// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ spyod pa rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bcom ldan
450a7(ta): kun tu bzang po yis// gnyid log rkyen thub bstan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lung ma bstan gyi gnyid dang ni// de nyid gnyid kyi rtsa ba'o// rtsa ba'i gnyid
450b1(ta): ni 'di lta ste// thog mar rang lus grub tsam na// mdzod spu'i sgo ru bag chags gnyid// pha ma'i shes rab de yi rtsa// 'gyu ba'i shes pa bying bar byed// gnyid kyi gang
450b2(ta): pa de ltar shes// gnyid log rtog pa med pa yin// lhun gyis grub pa'i spyan yin pas// gnyid de thig le'i klong du grol// thig le stong pa ngo sprod na// gnyid log rkyen
450b3(ta): thub ces bya'o// lung ma bstan gyi gnyid dag ni// gti mug ma rtogs shes pa bag la zha// ye shes ma shar 'khrul par mi snang bas// lung du ma bstan rang grol ma shA
450b4(ta): pas/ rtag nyid log lam byung rmis pa gsum// rmi ba 'khrul pa bag chags yin// 'khrul pa'i ngo bo 'gyu ba rang shar yin// gnyid kyi gzhi ma mdzod spur log/ rtsa yi/
450b5(ta): rgyal po shel gyi sdug pa can// khrag gi drod dang thig le'i rlung // de gsum 'dus pa gnyid kyi rgyu// rtsa dro snying la zug pas na// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje yis// 'khrul
450b6(ta): pa'i ngo bo 'gyur ba rang shar yin// 'gyu ba'i gsang lam 'gyus nas ni// mdzod spur gnyid ni phebs pa ni// snying smad khrag gi rtsa dang ni// snying stod thig le'i rtsa dang
450b7(ta): ni/ dbus na rlung gi rtsa gsum gnas// khrag gi rtsa yis rlung rtsa mnan// thig le'i steng du 'gyu ba log/ bsam gtan rang sa rtsa rlung mnan// shes rab ye shre
451a1(ta): rlung du ngo sprad pas// gnyis med thig le rang grol bas// gnyid log rkyen thub ces bya'o// zhes gsungs so// bsam gtan rtse gcig gi rgyud
451a2(ta): las gnyid thig le rang snang gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rmi lam rmis pa rkyen thub bstan pa ni// nyon cig
451a3(ta): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// lam ni mdzod spu gsang sgo yin// shes rab ye shes rlung gi lam mi snang // rmis pa rnam pa bzhi yin te// bag chags gnyid ni 'thun pa'i rmi
451a4(ta): lam yin// 'khrul pa'i gnyid ni dang po'i dus nas ldang // mtshams sbyor tshe lnga'i gnyid rmi'o// ye shes gnyid kyi ngo sprad rkyen thub pa// 'khrul pa'i gnyid ni ye
451a5(ta): shes rlung gis grol// mtshams sbyor tshe lnga'i rmi bas grol// bag chags rmis pa rang byung ye shes kyi// chags pa rang byung chen por spyod// ye shes rmis pa rang chen
451a6(ta): rlung dang sprod// shes rab rlung ste yeng shes zang thal rlung // bag ni thig la dkar dmar ro// chags pa 'gyu ba'i thig le la// de nas rang byung rkyen las grol// zhes gsut+pa
451a7(ta): so// bsam gtan rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ rmi lam rmis pa rkyen thub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// bar ngo
451b1(ta): rkyen thub bstan pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dran pa bzhi po rkyen thub pa// mngon shes drug dran rjes dran drug/ bar ma do yi 'od snang de// rang 'od rang snang rkyen
451b2(ta): thub yin// 'gyu ba ye shes rlung yin pas// ye shes rkyen thub ces kyang bya// yid 'jug shes rab ngo sprad pas// ngo spong rkyen thub ces kyang bya// bar do yin pa dran
451b3(ta): pa dang / tshe 'phos pa ni dran pa dang // 'gro drug rang snang dran pa dang // kun bzang rang sa dran pa'o// mngon shes drug ni 'di lta ste// 'gyu ba'i spyan gyis snga skye
451b4(ta): mthong / bar do 'od kyi snang ba mthong // dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu mthong // nga sprod sangs rgyas sa yang mthong // rigs mthun dag pa'i lha mig mthong // 'byung po mi
451b5(ta): min 'jig rten mthong // spyir ni 'gro drug longs skur mthong // rjes dran drug ni 'di lta ste// rnam par shes pa 'gag par dran// 'byung ba lnga po nub par dran// rang gi
451b6(ta): srog dbugs sngun chad dran// bar do lus po med pa dran// 'gyu ba srog rten med pa dran// bla ma'i ngo sprod gdams pa dran// dran pa drug po rang snang bas// sangs
451b7(ta): rgyas sa las mi 'da' bas// bar do rkyen thub ces bstan to// zhes gsungs so// rtse gcig zang thal gyi rgyud las/ rmi lam rmis pa rkyen thub dang bar do sbyang ba
452a1(ta): rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la// ye shes rkyen
452a2(ta): thub bstan pa ni// ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes zang thal rkyen med de// 'byung ba lnga po ye shes lnga// chags sdang med pas ye shes 'jig/ gnas dang
452a3(ta): stong pa'i rkyen thub yin// phung po sgo lnga ye shes lnga// rang byung ye shes kho na la// skye rgas na 'chi bzhi po las// rkyen thub par dor gdod nas dag/ dug lnga ye shes
452a4(ta): lnga ru snang // rang snang ye shes 'phel 'grib med// chags sdang rkyen thub rang snang gsol// rang byung rtsa lnga ye shes lnga// kha dog lnga las grub pa'i rtsa// dbus
452a5(ta): mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// mdun dang rgyab ni ser dang ljang // skud pa lnga yang ye shes lnga// gsal byed spyan lngas rab tu mdzes// shel gyi sbu gu zhes kyang
452a6(ta): bya/ longs sku 'od gsal zhes kyang bya// tshangs pa'i skud pa zhes kyang bya// ye shes rgyun srang zhes kyang bya// gsong ba'i lam chen de yin no// de ni nang na 'das pa
452a7(ta): lnga/ mu tig dkar po dri ma med// ra gan dmar po shin tu gdangs// gser 'dra ser po yon tan rgyas// bai DUr mthing kha 'gyur med ston// ni la ljang khu rab tu
452b1(ta): 'gro/ tshangs pa'i skud pa'i nang na gsal// rin chen sna lnga las grub pa'i// ye shes khong na chos min te// gsang ba'i ye shes rkyen thub yin// bar chad med pas
452b2(ta): rgyun mi 'chad// byed pas ma byas 'dus byas min// ye shes rgyun chad med pas rkyen thub bo// rkyen med ye shes rang snang gces// zhes gsungs so// ting
452b3(ta): nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ ye shes rkyen thub kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs
452b4(ta): rnams la// nges shes rkyen thub bstan pa ni// gzhi nges sangs rgyas gzhi ru shes// lam nges gzhi shes chos kyi mchog/ 'bras bu gzhi 'das ngo shes phyir mi
452b5(ta): ldog/ rgyu med rang shar nges shes rang byung ba// lta ba rang lta snang srid nges shes ltas// sgom pa nges shes phyogs ris med// spyod pa nges shes rang byung rgyu rkyen
452b6(ta): med/ ta'abras bu nges shes mi ldog rang sa non// skye med nges shes snang srid rang byung bas// rang byung ye shes rang byung rang la shar// ma rig rang byung gzung
452b7(ta): 'dzin kho nar 'bar// gzhi ru nges shes gnyis med zang thal yin// lam du nges shes gzung 'dzin lam du slongs// 'bras bu nges shes gzung 'dzin ye shes
453a1(ta): grol/ ye shes rkyen thub gzung 'dzin dkar nag dag/ ces gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ ye shes rkyen thub kyi le'u
453a2(ta): ste dgu pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas la// 'bras bu rkyen thub bstan pa ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba
453a3(ta): gsum// de la phyi yi rkyen thub bstan pa ni// phyi yi 'bras bu 'byung bam+ba// rang snang longs sku rgyun chad med// lha mo lnga la skye shi med// phyi yi 'bras bu
453a4(ta): rkyen thub yin// nang gi 'bras bu phung po lnga// dbyer med chos sku rgyun chad med// ye shes lngal skye 'chi med// nang gi 'bras bu rkyen thub yin// gsang ba'i 'bras bu
453a5(ta): chags sdang lnga// rang byung ye shes rang rig dang // lhag mthong nyid dang thams cad mkhyen// ye shes lnga la rgyun chad med// de ni gsang ba'i 'bras bu yin// yang
453a6(ta): gsang 'bras bu rtsa lnga la// rlung dang thig le rtsa dang ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dang // thig le chos min 'du 'bral med// 'du 'bral 'bras bu'i rkyen thub yin//
453a7(ta): 'du 'bral med pa 'bras bu'i mchog/ rgyun chad med pas rkyen thub yin// bar chad med na 'bras bu rgyal po yin// phyir mi ldog na 'bras bu'i nges shes yin// zhes
453b1(ta): gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ 'bras bu rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas kun tu bzang po yis// bag chags
453b2(ta): rkyen thub bstan pa ni// bag chags rnam pa gsum yin te// thog ma'i 'od kyi bag chags dang // bar du lus kyi bag chags dang // tha ma 'khrul pa gnas skabs bag
453b3(ta): chags gsum// thog ma 'od kyi bag chags de la ni// rang byung rang la shar bas rkyen thub bo// 'gyu ba ye shes gsal ba bag rkyen thub// bar du lus kyi
453b4(ta): bag dang chags// rang lus chos sku bag rkyen thub// chags pa rang byung shes pas bag chags thub// tha ma 'khrul pa gnas skabs chos// chos nyid ye shes 'bar
453b5(ta): nas gnas rkyen thub// rang rkyen rang la shar bas chags pa med// gnyis med rang la shar bas bag rkyen thub// bag chags rkyen khar mi snang rang byung ye shes
453b6(ta): gsal/ bag chags rkyen thub srid pa rang byung sel// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ bag chags rkyen thub kyi le'u ste bcu gcig
453b7(ta): pa'o// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// 'khrul pa rkyen thub bstan pa ni// thog ma 'khrul pa rlung gis 'khrul// bar du 'khrul pa
454a1(ta): chags sdang 'khrul// tha ma rang snang 'od la 'khrul// lhun grub ma ning 'khrul pa'i dbang // rlung gis thams cad grub pa yin// 'bras bu
454a2(ta): 'khrul pa sna tshogs smin// rlung de yi ye shes pa de// mi 'gag pa la rlung zhes bya// rang lus rlung gi dkyil 'khor na// rtsa lnga tshangs pa'i skud pa la// rlung
454a3(ta): rgyu rlung la drod yod pas// tshangs pa'i skar khung rlangs pa de// nyin zhag gcig lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyu// chos nyid me long gsal ba na// rlung ni 'gag med
454a4(ta): gisal bar rgyu// spyod na mya ngan 'das pa'i rlung // shes rab dag la rgyu ba'o// spyad na 'khor ba dag gi rlung // thig le dkar dmar gnyis la rgyu// lte ba rlung gi
454a5(ta): 'khor lo na// ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang yod// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo na// mthong ris gsum gyi sgo yang yod// theg dgu sgo dgu stod na gsum// theg
454a6(ta): gsum spyan gsum dag la snang // theg gcig mig gcig dri ma med// mdzod spu rang gsal sgron ma yang // de la ngo spyod 'khrul pa rkyen thub yin// ngan 'gro'i
454a7(ta): sgo gsum dkar dmar dang // dri chen sgo ru byung ba yin// dkar po dmyal ba dmar po yi dgas sgo// bshang kha byol song sgo yin no// pho dang mo la gsum
454b1(ta): ka tshang // dus tshod 'byung bas rang byung yin// zhes gsungs so// spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud las/ 'khrul pa rkyen thub kyi le'u ste/
454b2(ta): bcu gnyis pa'o// // ston pa chos sku kun tu bzang po'o// sdud pa po spyan ras gzigs seng ge rnam par rtse ba/ zhu ba po mkha' 'gro ma nyis
454b3(ta): 'phreng ba/ spyan ras gzigs ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ 'khor mkha' 'gro ma la rab tu gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// /
454b4(ta): / rtse gcig gi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni tra tha thi la du ta tan tra nA ma/
454b5(ta): bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin gyi ni byin gyis
454b6(ta): brlabs// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i sku// bde gshegs kun gyi ngo bo'i sku// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// phyogs lhung med pa'i dgongs pa
454b7(ta): shar/ rang gi dgongs pa ma bcos dang // bya btsal med pa'i klong du khyab// khyab par dbyung sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' rang byung sku// bde
455a1(ta): gshegs kun gyi gtso bo sku// sku mdog dkar po gangs ri 'dra// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags//
455a2(ta): g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags// sku stod dar dkar rgyan gsol ba// yon tan kun dang ldan pa'i rtags// sku smad
455a3(ta): ba ti ci gu ni// nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos rtags// de yi ngang las rang byung ba// sprul sku phyag na rdo rje ni// sku mdog ljang khu 'od zer lnga// g.yas pa
455a4(ta): rdo rje rtse dgu ni// sa dgu rang sar non pa'i rtags// g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa ni// gsang yum dbyings na gnas pa'i rtags// na bza' ljang khu gsol ba ni//
455a5(ta): 'phrin las 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal mdog mthing khar bstan pa ni// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags// bde gshegs de yi byin brlabs las//
455a6(ta): mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga sprul te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku mdog dkar// rdo rje rang rtags sdigs mdzub dang // lcags kyu thogs nas 'gro ba 'dren// dbyings kyi mkha'
455a7(ta): 'gro sku mdog ser// rdo rje zhags pas rnam rtog 'ching // dam tshig mkha' 'gro lcags sgrog gis// gzung 'dzin 'ching zhing 'gro ba sgrol// las kyi mkha'
455b1(ta): 'gro sku mdog dmar// rdo rje lcags sgrog rnam rtog sdom// sha za'i mkha' 'gro'i sku mdog ldang // rdo rje dril bu sdug bsngal 'joms// ye shes mkha' 'gro sku
455b2(ta): mdog mthing // rdo rje thod khrag 'khor brdug/ gtso bo mkha' 'gro rnams la ni// las byed mkha' 'gro mang pos bskor// dam nyams chad pa gcod par
455b3(ta): byed/ kun tu bzang po'i chos skyong ma// rdo rje dza ti ral pa can// g.ya sa na spu gri g.yon na ba nA d+ha'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma tshogs rnams// sha za
455b4(ta): khrag 'thung 'khor gyis bskor// bdi gshegs de yi byin brlabs las// ma gcig mkha' 'gro drag mo yi// lhums nas dga' rab rdo rje sprul// mkha' 'gro ma
455b5(ta): rnams rab tu dgyes// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs rnams kyis// drag po lta stangs thog 'bebs zhus// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// drag po kun 'dul
455b6(ta): ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad zhus// drag po drag mo 'dul ba yi// thabs mchog bla med nga yis bshad// ces gsungs so//
455b7(ta): phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro rnams kyis
456a1(ta): sutadapa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// bdag cag mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// de yi 'dul ba'i chos zhu 'tshal// zhes zhus pa
456a2(ta): he he rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// ye shes rgyal po thog 'bebs 'di// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la nga yis bshad// rtse gcig nyon cig mkha' 'gro ma// za 'og
456a3(ta): gur khyim bla re la// ri mo'i rnam pa bsam yas kyang // bsdus pas za 'og gur khyim yin// kha dog sna tshogs 'ja' gsal ba// chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i
456a4(ta): 'du 'bral med na dgongs pa yin// 'khor ba rang byung 'gro drug 'di// thig le ye shes gzugs snang yin// dmyal ba'i me lce 'bar ba dang // rang
456a5(ta): snang 'khrul pa'i ngo bo ni// chos sku thig le rang snang yin// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs dang // sprul sku thub pa drug po ni// 'gro drug drang phyir lung bstan
456a6(ta): yin/ rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' de// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying la gnas// chos sku kun tu bzang po de// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gtsug na gnas// sprul
456a7(ta): sku dga' rab rdo rje de// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdun na gnas// mkha' 'gro rig pa'i ye shes de// chos min rtsol sgrub blo las grol// lta ba thod rgal nyam nga
456b1(ta): med/ spyod bzod rgal thabs snang grol// sgom pa blo grol ye shes shar// 'bras bu rang byung lhun gyis grug/ ces gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs/
456b2(ta): kyi rgyud las/ ye shes thog tu dbab gsung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// he he ston pa rdo rje sems
456b3(ta): dpa'i sku// bdag cag mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams la// dri med ye shes thog 'bebs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/
456b4(ta): nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sngon klu'i rgyal po dga' bo yis// drang srong dri med bltar phyin pas// shel gyi sgo khang nang du tshud// nor bu rin chen de ru rnyed//
456b5(ta): nor bu de la 'od byung bas// 'dod pa sna tshogs de ru grub// bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin to// dri med ye shes zang thal de// ngo shes pa yis dri med shas//
456b6(ta): rang byung ye shes dri med rnyed// yon tan phyogs med rang snang bas// chos kyi spros pa de ru chod// ces gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las
456b7(ta): ye shes dri med rang chas su bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' la/
457a1(ta): sbyor sgrol mchod pa dbul lags na// bzhes te dngos grub bdag la stsol// gzugs la rnam gsum zhes bya ba// de nyid chos skur
457a2(ta): sbyor sgrom nas// gzugs kyi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan spyan la mchod par 'bul// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// de nyid longs skur
457a3(ta): sbyor sgrol nas// sgra yi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan snyan la mchod par 'bul// ro la rnam gsum shes byas te// de nyid sprul skur sbyor sgrol na//
457a4(ta): ro yi dbang mchog dam pa 'dis// bcom ldan ljags la mchod par 'bul// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru sbyor sgrol te// dri la dbang
457a5(ta): ba'i mchog yin te// bcom ldan shang sa la mchod par 'bul// reg la rnam gsum shes byas te// mngon byang sku ru sbyar sgrol nas/ reg gi dbang mchog dam pa yin// skul mchod 'bul ba zhes sug
457a6(ta): yid la rnam gsum shes byas te/ denyid ye shes sku ru sbyor zhing sgol// sid la mchod 'dul ba zhes su gsol// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ sbyor rlol mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje
457a7(ta): mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang // bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor maN+Dal dbul ba ni// 'byung lnga dbus kyi dkyil 'khor
457b1(ta): du/ rin chen sna bdun tshom bu bkod// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin brlabs na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dbul// skye med dngos grub stsal du gsol// rtsa
457b2(ta): 'dab lnga yis dkyil 'khor du// thig le rlung gi sa tshon la// rang byung ye shes sa tshon bkod// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dbul// rang byung dngos grub sbrul du
457b3(ta): gsol/ ta zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor maN+Dal phul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // rdo rje
457b4(ta): mkha' 'gro rnams kyis su// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni// snang srid tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang byung bdud
457b5(ta): rtsi sna tshogs gsog/ gnyis su med pa'i chos sku rdzogs// gnyis med rang byung 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la bskor// skye ba med pa 'khor lo
457b6(ta): 'di/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la dbul// rang lus tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang rig sku lnga ye sogs la// dbyer med rang grol thig ler rdzogs//
457b7(ta): rang rig rang shar 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la bskor// rang byung dag pa'i dngos grub gsol// si ra tshogs pa'i gzhal yas na// rang rig ye
458a1(ta): shes lhag mthong tshogs// rang snang dag pa'i 'khor lo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' che la 'bul// rang snang rang grol dngos grub stsol/
458a2(ta): zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams
458a3(ta): kyis/ rang la rang byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i gtso// sha dang khrag dang rus pa med// chu yi zla ba lta bu'i sku// skyon med dri ma
458a4(ta): rnam par dag/ nyi ma'i 'od bas gsal zhing 'tsher// byin brlabs mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// rnam dag pad+ma'i sku lta bu'i// gzha' tshon dang bltar mdzes pa//
458a5(ta): 'gro mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU mkha' 'gro ma rnams tshur nyon dang // nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// skye 'chi med pa'i byin gyis brlabs// nga
458a6(ta): ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// 'gyur ba med pa'i byin gyis brlabs// nga ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// dri med dag par byin gyis rlobs// nga ni las kyi mkha'
458a7(ta): 'gro ste/ rang grol 'ub chub byin gyis brlabs// nga ni dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ste// ye shes rang snang byin gyis brlabs// rang rig rang byung byin rlabs
458b1(ta): 'di/ mkha' la nyi ma shar ba 'dra// rang las byung ba'i byin rlabs 'di// nam mkha'i dkyil nas glog 'gyu 'dra// rang las 'bar ba'i ye shes 'di//
458b2(ta): ha li 'bar la me byung 'dra// rang la snang ba'i thig le 'di// me mar 'od dang chas pa 'dra// rang las shar ba'i zang thal 'di// bar snang gzha' tshon dngas pa 'dra//
458b3(ta): rang las byung ba'i 'gyu ba 'di// bu chung skad dang chas pa 'dra// rang la rdzogs pa'i sku lnga 'di// dkyil 'khor gsal dang chas pa 'dra// rang lasang shar ba'i
458b4(ta): byin rlabs 'di// man shel 'od dang chas pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ rang las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste
458b5(ta): bdun pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// ston pa'i spyan sngar dgongs pa phul ba ni// mkha' 'gro med pa'i sngon rol na//
458b6(ta): lta sgom spyod pa'i ming yang med// 'bras bu rang grol bar mtshams med// mkha' 'gro med pa'i sngon rol na// 'byung ba lnga po ye nas med// rang byung dbyings
458b7(ta): kyi dgongs pa bstan// rgyun chad med na lam gyi mchog/ bar chad med na 'bras bu 'phags// snang srid rang gsal gzhi las grol// 'khor ba rang byung gnas
459a1(ta): kyi mchog/ snang bar 'od 'bar longs sku'i gtso// rig pa 'od gsal sprul sku'i gtso// 'du 'bral med pas kun khyab sku// dbyer med
459a2(ta): rang grol 'od gsal ye shes sku// 'gyu ba rang grol rdo rje'i sku// shes rab dag pa rdo rje'i sku// 'du 'bral med pas kun khyab sku// thog dman sku dang ye
459a3(ta): shes rnams// phyogs su lhung ba'i gol sa yin// rdzogs chen rang grol rang snang sgyu// ye shes rang byung khyad par che// snang srid rnam dag ngo mtshar che// snang
459a4(ta): ba 'od las grub pa yi// mkha' 'gro lnga ni ngo mtshar che// rang byung lus las grub pa yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ngo mtshur che// rig pa sems las grub pa yi//
459a5(ta): rang shar mkha' 'gro ngo mtshar che// 'gyu ba 'od las grub pa yi// rang rig mkha' 'gro ngo mtshar che// rang rig thig le mkha' 'gro ma// si ra lnga yi dbus na
459a6(ta): 'gying // snang ba dbyibs kyi gtor ma za// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i gtor ma za// rang byung 'dod yon gtor ma za// rang grol bde ba'i gtor ma za// snang srid
459a7(ta): thig le'i gtor ma za// gtor zan mkha' 'gro dam la gnas// dam la gnas kyi dam la thogs// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol// zhes gsungs
459b1(ta): so/ ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ dgongs pa bstan cing gtor ma rang las byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // e ma ho mkha'
459b2(ta): 'gro ma rnams// gar gyi mchod pa gsung du gsol// zhes ston pas slar gsungs pas/ mkha' 'gro ma yis gar byas te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gar gyi
459b3(ta): gluta hUM hUM hUM badz+ra DA ki hUM te te te na hUM bud+d+ha hUM/ rdo rje rtse lnga spyi gtsug bzhag/ dril bu gsang ba'i kha ru bstan// mkha' 'gro ma yi gar byas te// thabs dang
459b4(ta): shes rab brda ru bstan// tsU hUM hUM rat+na DA ki hU~M te te te na bud+d+ha hUM/ rin po che ni snying khar bzhag/ snyan pa'i pi wang rna bar gtad// rin chen spyan gsum brda ru
459b5(ta): bstan// hU hUM hUM pad+ma DA ki hUM te ta ta na bud+d+ha hUM/ pad+ma mdog gsal gsang ba ra bzhag/ sna tshogs zhal snod kha la gdengs// skyon med rnam dag brda ru bstan//
459b6(ta): hUM hUM hU karma DA ki hU~M te te tai na hUM bud+d+ho hUM/ rgya gram rkang pa'i mthil du bzhag/ chos kyi dung ni lte bar bstan// rang byung rang grol brda ru bstan// hU hUM hU bud+d+ha DA ki
459b7(ta): hU~M ti te te na hUM/ 'khor lo 'bar ba snying khar bstan// rdo rje dril bu snying khar bstan// rang byung 'khor ba rang grol dang // kun kyang bskyed pa lte ba ni// phyag
460a1(ta): rgya gar rtags 'gro ba 'dul// rang byung 'byung po 'dul ba yi// thabs kyi phyag rgya cir yang bstan// gzugs kyi sku ni nges med pa/
460a2(ta): rang byung nyon mongs ma nges brda// rang grol ston pa'i thabs chen yin// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ gar thabs brda'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
460a3(ta): / bcom ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas// rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa'i gtso// bdag gis rtogs pa 'di bzhes shig/ dug gsum ye
460a4(ta): shes thig ler snang // rang snang bdud rtsi ngo mtshar che// sdug bsngal thig le bde bar shar// rang grol rgyal po ngo mtshar che// nyon mongs rang byung ye shes 'bar//
460a5(ta): cho 'phrul sngon 'byung ngo mtshar che// lus po cho 'phrul chos skur snang // rang las snang ba ngo mtshar che// ngag gi cho 'phrul longs skur shar// rang las byung ba ngo mtshar
460a6(ta): tshesems kyi cho 'phrul sprul skur 'bar// rang las shar ba ngo mtshar che// mi rtogs pa la sku gsum gsang // rang gsang thabs kyis chod pa e ma ho//
460a7(ta): rtogs pas thig le chos min la// rtsol sgrub rang grol e ma ho// spyod pa tshad las 'das pas snang srid thig ler grol// sgom pa tshad las 'das pas ye shes
460b1(ta): rgyun mi 'chad// lta ba tshad las 'das pas dbyer med rang sgor gsal// 'bras bu tshad las 'das pas 'pho ba'i yul ma rnyed// rang byung tshad las 'das pas
460b2(ta): rtsol ba'i gnad dang bral// ma rig tshad las 'das pas skye 'chi dag las grol// rig pa tshad las 'das pas sangs rgyas yul me dang shar// ye shes tshad
460b3(ta): las 'das pas thig le khong nas rdol// nyams myong tshad las 'das pas 'gyu ba dkar nag sangs// bde ba tshad las 'das pas tshogs drug rang sar grol//
460b4(ta): rtogs pa tshad las 'das pas thig le chos min shar// zhes gsungs so// phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ dgongs
460b5(ta): pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // ston pa kun bzang rdo rje sems// phyag na rdo rje'i byin brlabs las// mkha' 'gro ma yi brdar shar bas// rdo
460b6(ta): rje sems sogs rab tu dges// zhes gsungs so// ye shes thog 'bebs phyag na rdo rje drag po lto stangs kyi rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
460b7(ta): pa'o// phyag na rdo rje drag po lta stangs kyi rgyud ye shes thog 'bebs kyi rgyud ye shes thog 'bebs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// /
461a1(ta): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bo tra lo ka tra ta ta na tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud ces bya ba/
461a2(ta): dpal kun tu bzang po rtogs pa rang byung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang
461a3(ta): 'phags pa mi g.yo ba dang // dur khrod bdag po gdong rings ma dang / bdud mo kun dga' brgya byin dang / mkha' 'gro ma glog gi 'phreng ba dang /
461a4(ta): spyan ras gzigs dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / dga' rab rdo rje dang sa la gnas pa'i rigs 'dzin kun// bcom
461a5(ta): ldan kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar 'khor// bskor ba phyag byas rig pa'i me tog phul// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang byung rang shar chos zhu 'tshal// zhes
461a6(ta): zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mkha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba rnams// legs par zung zhig mkha' 'gro ma// gzhi snang
461a7(ta): chen po lhun grub la// 'od lnga rang shar rang grol dang // 'gro drug rang shar rang grol dang // sku lnga rang shar rang grol dang // yum lnga rang sher rang grol dang /
461b1(ta): ye shes rang shar rang grol dang // chos sku rang shar rang grol dang // spyan gsum rang shar rang grol dang // thig le rang shar rang grol dang // khams gsum
461b2(ta): rang shar rang grol lo// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi zhus lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas
461b3(ta): kun tu bzang po yis// gzhi nyid rang shar bstan pa ni// ngo bo kun gsal rang bzhin stong // thugs rje mi 'gag mi 'gyur dang // 'phrin las cir yang
461b4(ta): thogs pa med// gzhi lnga rang shar ngo bo gcig/ gcig po kun shar kun gzhi yin// ji ltar snang ba gzhi las shar// rang shar gzhi yi don la mkhas//
461b5(ta): mkhas pa chen po gsal ba che// ngo bo rang shar chad pa ston// rang bzhin stong pas rtag pa ston// thugs rje mi 'gag rang byung bas// rol pa cir yang
461b6(ta): 'char bar ston// yon tan mi 'gyur zad med ston// 'phrin las thogs med rang shar ston// ston pa kun gzhi'i phyi mo yi ni// rang shar ga nad shes
461b7(ta): gzhi yi gdeng // zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las gzhi rang shar rang grol gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
462a1(ta): kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro glog 'phreng ma// lhun grub rang shar 'od du shar// ngo bo dkar po'i gdangs su
462a2(ta): shar/ rang bzhin mthing kha'i gdangs su shar// thugs rje dmar po'i gdangs su shar// yon tan ser po'i gdangs su shar// 'phrin las ljang khu'i
462a3(ta): gdangs su shar// gzhi nyid 'od lnga'i ngo bor shar// gzhing shar shes pas 'od las grol// 'od kyi 'khrul pa rang shar bas// rang shar rang grol ngo mtshar
462a4(ta): zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/ 'od lnga rang shur rang grol gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas
462a5(ta): bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// nyon cig mkha' 'gro glog 'phreng ma// gzhi mo'i don la mkhas pa ni// kun gyi thun mong ma yin no// dug lnga rang shar
462a6(ta): bstan pa ni// ngo bo zhe sdang rang shar yin// rang bzhin gti mug rang shar yin// thugs rje 'dod chags rang shar yin// yon tan nga rgyal rang shar yin//
462a7(ta): 'phrin las khong khro phrag dog rang shar yin// rang shar gzhi shes ngo mtshar che// rang grol dug lnga gnas su dag/ gnas su dag pas rang sar grol// gzhi
462b1(ta): las rang shar bsgyur bas min// spyi gzhi mkhas na mkhas pa yin// tshig la mkhas pa ne tso 'dra// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/
462b2(ta): dug lnga rang shar rang grol gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan kun bzang gis// mkha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba la// 'gro drug
462b3(ta): rang shar rang grol bstan pa ni// ngo bo rang shar zhe sdang dmyal ba// rang bzhin rang shar gti mug byol song // thugs rje rang shar 'dod chags yi dgas//
462b4(ta): yon tan rang shar nga rgyal mi// 'phrin las rang shar khong khro lha ma yin// 'phrin las rang shar phrag dog de ba'o// gzhi nyid rang shar 'byung lnga 'od// go
462b5(ta): rim rang shar shes gzhi'i rtsa la// dug lnga sgo la gzhi nyid rang shar yin// ngo bo rna ba rang bzhin mig/ thugs rje lce la yon tan sna// 'phrin las 'og sgo
462b6(ta): gnyis su shar// gzhi nyid rang shar byed pa byas pa med// gzhi med rang shar ngo mtshar rmad du che// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud mas//
462b7(ta): 'gro drug rang shar rang grol gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// sku lnga sum lnga rang shar bstan pa ni// ngo bo longs
463a1(ta): sku rang shar ro// rang bzhin chos sku rang shar ro// thugs rje sbrul sku rang shar ro// yon tan rdo rje'i skur shar ro// 'phrin las mngon
463a2(ta): byang sku ru shar/ ngo bo sangs rgyas spyan du shar// rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings phyug mo// thugs rje gos dkar ma ru shar// yon tan mA ma kI ru shar/
463a3(ta): 'phrin las dam tshig sgrol mar shar// gzhi nyid rang shar ngo mtshar che// bsgrub mi dgos par rang shar yin// nyi ma 'od du rang shar bzhin// gzhi mo rgyal
463a4(ta): ba yab yum bar// rang shar grol ba ngo mtshar che// rtsol sgrub ma byas gzhi la mkhas// yon tan rang shar bas ma gtan thun tshad cig/ ces gsungs
463a5(ta): so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/ rgyal ba yab yum rang shar gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po
463a6(ta): yis/ tamakha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba la// yeng shes rang shar bstan pa ni// ngo bo gsal ba dngos med pa// me long yeng shes rang shar yin//
463a7(ta): rang bzhin stong pa yul med de// chos kyi dbyings kyi yeng shes shar// thugs rje sna tshogs gcod pa de// so sor rtog pa'i yeng shes shar// yon tan
463b1(ta): kun la snyoms pa de// mnyam pa nyid kyi yeng shes yin// 'phrin las cir yang snang ba de// bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yin// gzhi nyid dbyer med rang snang
463b2(ta): bas/ ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes shar// ye ni gzhi mo'i don la mkhas// shes pa gzhi yi yon tan no// gzhi snang chen po shes pa ni// ye shes
463b3(ta): rang shar rang sar grol// rang grol yang shes ma shar na// lkog gyur yang shes phyi dus 'debs// ye shes rang shar shes nas sgom pa'i nad dang bral//
463b4(ta): snang 'dod ma yin ye nas rang shar la// rang shar ye shes ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang gi rgyud las// ye shes rang shar rang
463b5(ta): grol gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// chos sku rang shar rang grol dgongs pa bstan pa ni// gzhi mo ye
463b6(ta): nas zang thal bas// chos sku rang shar zadang thal yin// gzhi mo'i rgyu rkyen ma bskyed pas// chos sku rten med rang shar yin// gzhi mo 'dus byas ma yin/
463b7(ta): pas/ ta chos sku 'dus ma byas su shar// gzhi mo ye nas mi 'gag pas// chos sku yon tan phyogs me dang shar// gzhi mo rtsol sgrub ma byas pas//
464a1(ta): chos sku rang shar rtsol sgrub min// gzhi mo phyogs med rang shar rgya ma chad// chos sku rgya ma chad pa dang // phyogs med chen
464a2(ta): por rang shar ro// gzhi mo gnyis su med pas na// gnyis med chos kyi sku ru shar// gzhi la dbyibs dang kha dog med// gnyis med dbyibs med chos
464a3(ta): kyi sku ru shar// gzhi la yon tan tshangs pas na// ngo bo 'ong du bstan pa yin// 'od la yon tan mi 'gags pas// longs sku gzugs snang rang shar
464a4(ta): ro// chos sku gzhi mo ma 'gags pas// sprul sku dngos su rang shar ro// gzhi yi mtshan ma rang grol bas// sku gsum rang shar rang grol yin/
464a5(ta): zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/ chos sku rtsol sgrub ma byas rang shar rang grol gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
464a6(ta): de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba la// thig le rang shar bstan pa ni// gzhi nyid zang thal thig tu shar//
464a7(ta): thugs rje mi 'gag le'ur shar// rang bzhin stong pa nyag gcig shar// de ni gzhi yi thig le yin// gzhi yi yon tan 'od du shar// de ni lam gyi
464b1(ta): le'ur shar// ngo bo 'od gsal thig tu shar// de nyid zang thal nyag gcig shar// de ni dang po'i thig le yin// 'gro ba rigs drug le'ur shar//
464b2(ta): ngo bo gzhi snang thig tu shar// de nyid zang thal nyag gcig shar// snang ba mi 'gag le'ur shar// rig pa rang gsal thig tu shar// de ni bar
464b3(ta): gyi thig le rang shar yin// rtsa lnga skud pa le'ur shar// 'gyu ba dngos med thig tu shar// ngo bo stong pa nyag gcig shar// de ni tha ma rang shar
464b4(ta): yin// rang shar mi 'gag le'ur shar// de nyid rang grol thig tu shar// dbyer med rang snang nyag gcig shar// zhes gsungs so//
464b5(ta): 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las thig le rang shar gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang /
464b6(ta): mkha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba la// spyan gsum rang shar bstan pa ni// gzhi nyid rang gsal chen po ste// de nyid chos kyi spyan du shar// gzhi nyid
464b7(ta): thugs rje ma 'gags pas// thabs dang shes rab spyan du shar// gzhi yi rang bzhin stong pa ste// de nyid ye shes spyan du shar// de ni gzhi yi rang
465a1(ta): shar yin// 'od lnga chos kyi spyan du shar// 'grub shes pa spyan du shar// yid gsum ye shes spyan du sha
465a2(ta): de ni lam gyi spyan gsum yin// rna ba chos kyi spyan du shar// snying kha shes rab spyan du shar// mig ni ye shes spyan du shar// de ni rtags
465a3(ta): kyi spyan gsum yin// 'gyu ba chos kyi spyan du shar// yid ni shes rab spyan du shar// mdzod spu ye shes spyan du shar// de ni don gyi spyan
465a4(ta): gsum yin// rin chen man shel zang thol te// de ni yeng shes spyan dung shar// ngo bo gsal ba chos kyi spyan// zer mi 'gag pa shes rab
465a5(ta): spyan/ de ni gzhi yi spyan gyi depe// 'od ni chos kyi spyan gyi dge// thig le shes rab spyan du bstan// zer ni ye shes spyan du bstan//
465a6(ta): de ni don gyi spyan gsum yin// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las/ spyan gsum rang shar gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//
465a7(ta): bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// mkha' 'gro glog gi 'phreng ba la// khams gsum rang shar bstan pa ni// gzhi
465b1(ta): mo stong pa rang shar ba// de ni gzugs med khams su shar// gzhi mo ngo bo gsal ba de// de ni 'dod khams rang shar yin// gzhi mo thugs
465b2(ta): rje mi 'gag pa// de ni gzugs khams rang shar yin// bod lnga gzugs su rang shar ro// 'gyu ba 'dod pa'i khams su shar// yid ni
465b3(ta): gzugs med khams su shar// de ni lam gyi rang shar ro// gzugs khams gnas ris bsam yas pas// 'od kyi lus pa 'gyur ba yin//
465b4(ta): 'dod khams gnas ris bsam yas pa// 'gyu ba lo ma rang shar yin// gzugs med skye mched mu med pa// yid 'gyu rten med rang shar
465b5(ta): yin/ de ni 'bras bu rang shar yin// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud las khams gsum rang grol gyi
465b6(ta): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang po yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro glog 'phreng khyod// rang shar
465b7(ta): gzhi mo ma shes na// lam rgyus med pa'i mgron po 'dra// gzhi mo rang grol ma shes na// grang nad can gyi ga pur 'dra// gzhi mo'i skyon
466a1(ta): yon ma shes na// long ba byang thang las pa 'dra// gzhi mo'i rtsa ba mchod na// rtsa ba rul ba'i lo ma 'dra//
466a2(ta): gzhi mo'i don la mkhas pas ni// nor bu rin chen rnyed pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// 'khor bar 'grol gyi rgyud las/ skyon
466a3(ta): yon rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa mi g.yo ba 'khor ba rang grol gyi rgyud chen po las ston
466a4(ta): pa kun tu bzang po/ zhu ba po mi g.yo ba/ zhu ba mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// /
466a5(ta): / rang grol gyi rgyud rdzogs so// // lho stag tshang seng ge ru/ ldom bi chung ram la brgyud/
466a6(ta): des myang ston la/ des dbus pa ston pa la brgyud pa lags so// // @zhus dag
